courses.title: [반도체 전문가] 우종석의 2023 반도체 산업 트렌드
courses.bio: 반도체를 전혀 모르는 사람도 알 수 있는 2023 반도체 산업과 기술 트렌드
objectives: 반도체 산업의 기본적인 구조와 주요 제품을 알 수 있다.
슈퍼사이클의 개념을 이해하고, 반도체 산업의 다음 사이클을 예측해볼 수 있다.
반도체의 수요가 확장되는 이유와 공급이 폭발적으로 늘어났음에도, 공급이 부족한 현상이 발생하는 이유를 알 수 있다.
한국, 미국, 대만, 일본의 반도체 산업 장단점 비교를 통해 글로벌 반도체 생태계를 알 수 있다.
DRAM과 NAND로 나뉘어진 메모리 반도체 시장을 이해하고, 차세대 메모리 반도체 기술인 PIM과 HBM 반도체를 설명할 수 있다.
비메모리 반도체의 다양한 기능 중에서 전자기기의 뇌라고 부를 수 있는 AP, 눈을 담당하는 CIS, 화면을 구현하는 DDI의 역할을 자세하게 설명할 수 있다.
반도체 산업의 핵심 이슈인 '미세화'를 이해하고, 메모리/비메모리 반도체가 '미세화'를 위해서 어떠한 기술들을 도입하고 있는지 설명할 수 있다.
초 미세화를 위해 EUV의 개념을 이해하고, 그 필요성을 설명할 수 있다.
미세공정이 기술적 한계에 봉착하게 된 과정을 이해하고, 반도체의 새로운 발전 방향으로 반도체 패키징 기술이 급부상하고 있음을 설명할 수 있다.
requirements: 별도의 선수지식이 없어도 충분히 수강이 가능합니다.
courses.description:
반도체 산업의 트렌드는 기술을 빼놓고 이야기할 수 없습니다.
반도체 산업부터 기술까지, 반도체 산업 구조가 어떻게 굴러가는지 필수적인 핵심 키워드 세 개로 꼭꼭 짚어주는 친절한 반도체 트렌드 강의입니다.


[Step.1] 반도체 산업 현황 알아보기
[핵심 키워드] 하나! 점점 짧아지는 슈퍼사이클
[핵심 키워드] 둘! 반도체 시장에서의 이상한 공급과 수요
[핵심 키워드] 셋! 국내 및 세계 반도체 시장의 현황은? : 국가를 중심으로


[Step.2] 메모리 반도체 트렌드 살펴보기
[핵심 키워드] 하나! 메모리 시장은 일반적으로 Cycle 진폭이 크다.
[핵심 키워드] 둘! 메모리 시장은 DRAM과 NAND로 이원화 되어 있다.
[핵심 키워드] 셋! 차세대 메모리 반도체의 기술 : PIM과 HBM


[Step.3] 비메모리 반도체 트렌드 살펴보기
[핵심 키워드] 하나! 세분화 된 비메모리 반도체 시장 : 비메모리는 두뇌 역할만?
[핵심 키워드] 둘! 비메모리 반도체의 다품종 소량 생산
[핵심 키워드] 셋! 비메모리 반도체 적용 분야


[Step.4] 미세공정 기술과 한계 알아보기
[핵심 키워드] 하나! 미세공정이 필요한 이유
[핵심 키워드] 둘! 메모리와 비메모리 미세공정 차이?
[핵심 키워드] 셋! 미세공정 기술과 한계
target_audience: 반도체 산업군에 관심이 많으면서, 앞으로의 반도체 산업 방향성에 대한 인사이트를 얻고 싶으신 분
반도체 산업에 투자를 하고자 하시는 분
반도체 산업을 잘 모르지만, 반도체가 무엇인지 혹은 왜 중요한지 궁금하신 분
반도체 산업을 1도 모르지만, 산업을 빠르게 공부 해보고 싶은 분
포스트 코로나 시대에 반도체 산업이 어떻게 대응하고 있는지 궁금하신 분
반도체에 사용되는 기술들이 어떻게 변화해왔고, 현재 어떤 기술들이 각광받고 있는지 궁금하신 분
전기차에 왜 비메모리 반도체가 많이 사용되는지 궁금하신 분
반도체 관련 중소/중견 기업에 관심을 갖고 계신 분

courses.title: Profesional Pemandu Wisata
courses.bio: menjadi profesional pemandu wisata
objectives: Pengantar Pemanduan Wisata

requirements: tertarik pada profesi pemandu wisata
courses.description:
Selamat datang di kursus "Profesional Pemandu Wisata: Menjadi Profesional Pemandu Wisata"! Dalam kursus ini, Anda akan menjelajahi dunia menarik dari pemanduan wisata dan belajar bagaimana menjadi pemandu yang sukses dan profesional. Baik Anda seorang pemula yang ingin memasuki industri pariwisata atau seorang pemandu berpengalaman yang ingin meningkatkan keterampilan, kursus ini dirancang untuk membantu Anda mencapai tujuan tersebut.
Kursus ini mencakup berbagai topik penting, mulai dari pengenalan dasar-dasar pemanduan wisata hingga keterampilan lanjutan yang diperlukan untuk memberikan pengalaman wisata yang tak terlupakan. Anda akan mempelajari teknik komunikasi efektif, cara mengelola kelompok wisatawan, serta bagaimana merencanakan dan mempersiapkan tur yang menarik. Kami juga akan membahas etika profesional dan tanggung jawab pemandu wisata, sehingga Anda dapat beroperasi dengan integritas dan menghormati budaya serta lingkungan lokal.
Melalui materi interaktif, video pembelajaran, dan simulasi pemanduan, Anda akan mendapatkan pengetahuan dan pengalaman praktis yang diperlukan untuk menjadi pemandu wisata yang dicari oleh banyak orang. Anda akan belajar cara menghadapi berbagai situasi yang mungkin terjadi selama pemanduan dan bagaimana menjalin hubungan yang baik dengan wisatawan, sehingga mereka merasa nyaman dan terlibat.
Di akhir kursus ini, Anda akan memiliki keahlian dan kepercayaan diri untuk memulai karier sebagai pemandu wisata profesional. Bergabunglah dengan kami dan mulailah perjalanan Anda untuk menjadi pemandu wisata yang sukses, siap memberikan pengalaman tak terlupakan kepada wisatawan di destinasi favorit Anda!
target_audience: masyarakat yang tertarik dengan profesi pemandu wisata
masyarakat umum

courses.title: Maintenance Mastery - Advanced Practices
courses.bio: Optimal maintenance planning, KPI interpretation, failure analysis, and workplace safety.
objectives: Optimize spare parts inventory to reduce costs while ensuring reliability.
Conduct effective post-failure analysis to identify root causes and improve system reliability.
Understand and apply key maintenance KPIs such as MTBF, MTTR, and availability to enhance processes.
Plan and schedule maintenance activities for maximum efficiency and minimal downtime
Recognize workplace hazards in maintenance and apply proper protective measures.
Implement LOTOTO systems, safety matrices, and Heinrich’s Pyramid to improve safety culture.

Structure and Operation of the Maintenan: Quiz for Module 3: "Structure and Operation of the Maintenance Department"
Key indicators and maintenance efficienc: Quiz for Module 4: " Key indicators and maintenance efficiency“
Planning and Work Organization in Mainte: Types of Work Covered by Planning and Scheduling
Sources of Work for the Schedule
Quiz for Module 5: "Planning and Work Organization in Maintenance"
Health & Safety in Maintenance Work: Hazards and Health & Safety in Maintenance
Organizational Aspects of Safety in Maintenance
Common Potentially Hazardous Events in Maintenance
Quiz for Module 6: "Health & Safety in Maintenance Work"

requirements: No prior experience in maintenance is required. Basic understanding of industrial operations will help, but all key concepts are explained from the ground up.
courses.description:
"This course contains the use of artificial intelligence."
This course takes you beyond the basics of maintenance management, providing practical methods and proven strategies to achieve higher efficiency, reliability, and safety.
We begin with the organization of the maintenance function — how to structure the department, define roles, manage spare parts, and apply inventory policies to minimize downtime. You will learn how to identify critical materials, improve communication, and implement continuous improvement through analytical methods.


Next, we focus on measuring maintenance performance. You will explore key performance indicators such as KPI, OEE, MTBF, MTTR, and availability, learning not only how to calculate them but also how to interpret results to make better decisions.
We then move to planning and scheduling — understanding the difference between the two, identifying work types, preparing effective job plans, and using tools like CMMS to optimize task execution. Practical concepts like “wrench time” will help you maximize the value of your maintenance workforce.


The course also covers advanced safety practices in maintenance, including the use of LOTOTO procedures, technical safeguards, organizational safety measures, and building a strong safety culture.


Based on over 17 years of professional experience, this course provides practical, proven methods to improve reliability, cut costs, and make better maintenance decisions.


Whether you are starting your career in maintenance or are an experienced technician, engineer, or manager seeking to organize and expand your knowledge, this course will equip you with the tools to improve reliability, reduce costs, and ensure safe, efficient operations.


By the end of the course, you will gain the knowledge needed to plan and organize work effectively, interpret KPIs for data-driven decisions, apply post-failure analysis for continuous improvement, and maintain the highest safety standards in your daily operations.


*This course contains the use of artificial intelligence.*
Some images, audio narration, and translations were created with the assistance of AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Ideogram, ElevenLabs, translation software). All materials have been reviewed and verified by the instructor to ensure accuracy and educational value.
target_audience: Maintenance managers, planners, engineers, supervisors, and technicians who want to improve spare parts management, use maintenance KPIs effectively, create optimized schedules, and enhance workplace safety.
This course is also ideal for those who want to start a career in maintenance and need the knowledge to understand how modern maintenance operations work.
Technical school students, vocational high school graduates, and engineering students aiming to build their future in maintenance departments or collaborate closely with them.

courses.title: Mastering India's Green Hydrogen Certification (GHCI)
courses.bio: Navigate Regulations, Compliance, and Unlock India's Green Hydrogen Market. A-Z guide for investors, managers, & enginee
objectives: Master the complete Green Hydrogen Certification Scheme of India (GHCI) framework.
Calculate a project's GHG emission intensity using the official formulas and methodologies.
Navigate the entire 4-stage certification process, from Concept Certificate to Final Certificate.
Develop a compliant Monitoring, Reporting, and Verification (MRV) plan for any green hydrogen project.
Avoid costly penalties by understanding the non-compliance rules and consequences.
Leverage the final certificate as a Guarantee of Origin (GO) and for the Carbon Credit Trading Scheme (CCTS).
Confidently advise stakeholders, investors, and project teams on GHCI compliance requirements.
requirements: A basic understanding of the energy sector or renewable energy concepts is helpful but not mandatory.
No prior knowledge of Indian energy policy is required; we start from the fundamentals.
A willingness to learn and engage with technical and regulatory details.
courses.description:
Unlock the Trillion-Dollar Opportunity in India's Green Hydrogen Sector with the Definitive Guide to the GHCI!
“This course contains the use of artificial intelligence.”


India is on a mission to become a global hub for Green Hydrogen, backed by the ambitious National Green Hydrogen Mission (NGHM). But to succeed in this market, you must navigate a complex maze of regulations, standards, and certification processes. Making a mistake can lead to costly delays, loss of incentives, and failed projects.
This course is your single source of truth for mastering the Green Hydrogen Certification Scheme of India (GHCI). Designed by industry experts, this comprehensive program transforms dense government policy into a clear, actionable roadmap for your projects. We will guide you step-by-step through the entire lifecycle—from understanding the core emission standards to obtaining your final certificate and leveraging it in the market.
In this comprehensive course, you will journey through:
Module 1: The Foundations: DECODE the National Green Hydrogen Mission (NGHM) and understand the "why" behind the GHCI. We'll demystify the crucial 2.0 kgCO2eq/kg H2 threshold and determine if certification is mandatory for your project.
Module 2: The Technical Rulebook: DIVE DEEP into the core rules. Master the concepts of System Boundary (what to measure) and the Materiality Threshold (what you can ignore), and understand the strict Renewable Energy criteria.
Module 3: The Certification Process A-Z: Get a practical, step-by-step walkthrough of the entire certification journey. Learn the purpose and application process for all four certificates: Concept, Facility-Level, Provisional, and Final. Never miss a deadline again.
Module 4: The GHG Calculation Masterclass: ROLL UP YOUR SLEEVES as we break down the complex emission calculation formulas from Annexure B. This technical deep dive is essential for engineers and compliance officers.
Module 5: Compliance, Consequences & Commercialization: LEARN how to stay compliant, understand the serious penalties for failure, and discover how to use your final certificate as a Guarantee of Origin (GO) and a gateway to the Carbon Credit Trading Scheme (CCTS).
This isn't just a theoretical course; it's a practical toolkit packed with real-world examples, checklists, and actionable insights to ensure your project is compliant, bankable, and successful.
Enroll today and become the go-to expert on Green Hydrogen certification in India!

courses.description:
في سنة 2020 وصل إجمالي المخلفات الصلبة البلدية عالمياً إلى 2.13 مليار طن (ويتوقع أن تصل في 2050 إلى 3.78 مليار طن)، بينما وصلت إجمالي المخلفات البلاستيكية عالمياً إلى 400 مليون طن/ سنة (يعاد تدوير 10% فقط منها)، أما  المخلفات الالكترونية فقد وصلت إلى 62 مليون طن/ سنة ويعاد تدوير 22.3% منها بشكل آمن بيئياً. وتقدر الوفيات عالمياً بسبب الإدارة غير الصحيحة للنفايات بـ 400 ألف إلى مليون إنسان.
لذلك كانت هذه الدورة للتعرف على ممارسات الإدارة البيئية السليمة للنفايات بأنواعها المختلفة، وعلاقة ذلك بالتغيرات المناخية، بالإضافة للتطرق إلى مفهوم الاقتصاد الدائري واستراتيجيات تطبيقه عملياً، وتنقسم الدورة لمحورين رئيسيين:

courses.title: Sustainability in the Textile and Clothing Industry
courses.bio: Analysis of textile sector from a sustainability point of view

Sustainability scope: Sustainability concepts: environmental and social sustainability
Sustainability: environmental, social and economic impact
Process and new technologies: Best Available Technologies (BAT) in the textile industry
Bringing sustainability to the consumer: Transparency across the complete textile chain

requirements: To attend this course there is no previous knowledge required.
courses.description:
The textile sector has a significant impact on the environment, from numerous points of view:
development of fast fashion with higher production of low-quality clothes;
textiles that become waste instead of being recycled;
pollutant production methods and technologies;
linear business models.
For this reason, the FACTIVE Massive Open Online Course (MOOC) aims to analyse the textile and clothing industry from a sustainability point of view, with a particular focus on the new processes, business models and technologies that can be used for an improvement of the environmental impact of the T&C sector.


The course is addressed mainly to actual or future product developers and R&D staff of companies. Indeed, these professional groups are designated as the most crucial target group for strategic training by companies that want to work on sustainability. However, sustainability requires an organisation-wide approach, and therefore, all professional categories can play a role in building a sustainable production process and must therefore receive the necessary training.


The course is divided into nine learning units, and foresees 2 hours of contents.
Each learning unit consists of:
Video lectures, each with a duration of 3-5 minutes, focusing on a specific aspect of the learning unit subject.
Quizzes, to reinforce your learning and to help you self-evaluate your level of knowledge
of the learning unit contents.
Resources/materials: to provide you with further readings, relevant open educational resources, link to online websites, etc.
target_audience: Fashion, Textile and Clothing actual or future product developer
Fashion, Textile and Clothing R&D staff
Fashion, Textile and Clothing students who want to improve their knowledge and skills in the field of sustainability

courses.title: Layer of Protection Analysis (LOPA) Training Course
courses.bio: Learn Practical Risk Assessment Techniques for Process Safety and Hazard Control in the Oil, Gas, and Process Industries
objectives: Explain the purpose and principles of Layer of Protection Analysis (LOPA).
Identify initiating events, independent protection layers (IPLs), and potential consequences.
Apply the LOPA methodology to evaluate process safety scenarios.
Determine whether existing safeguards meet acceptable risk criteria.
Understand the relationship between LOPA and Safety Integrity Levels (SIL).
Recognize common pitfalls and limitations in LOPA studies.
Integrate LOPA into broader process safety management frameworks.

Introduction: Lecture Note: Introduction to Process Safety and Risk Management

Fundamentals of Risk in Process Industries II

Lecture Note: Role of Independent Protection Layers (IPLs)
Human Factors in LOPA: Lecture Note: Human Factors in LOPA

requirements: A background in chemical/process engineering or related disciplines is recommended but not mandatory.
courses.description:
Layer of Protection Analysis (LOPA) is a widely used semi-quantitative risk assessment technique that helps organizations evaluate and manage process safety risks effectively. This course introduces learners to the principles, methodology, and application of LOPA, bridging the gap between Hazard and Operability (HAZOP) studies and advanced quantitative risk assessment. Participants will gain a practical understanding of how LOPA supports safety integrity level (SIL) determination, decision-making, and regulatory compliance.
Through real-world case studies and guided exercises, learners will develop the skills to systematically evaluate initiating events, independent protection layers (IPLs), and consequences. The course emphasizes the structured approach to risk evaluation, highlighting how LOPA ensures risks are reduced to tolerable levels. Special focus is placed on industry best practices, standards, and common pitfalls in LOPA implementation.
Designed for professionals working in safety, engineering, and risk management, this course balances theory with hands-on applications. Learners will discover how LOPA integrates into the broader process safety management (PSM) framework, supporting safer plant design, operation, and maintenance. By the end of the training, participants will be equipped with the confidence to contribute to or lead LOPA studies within their organizations be it the oil & gas, chemical, petrochemical, food and process industries.
Whether you are new to risk assessment or seeking to enhance your existing expertise, this course provides the foundation and applied knowledge to use LOPA as a reliable decision-making tool. It prepares learners to evaluate complex scenarios, identify gaps in protection, and recommend cost-effective safety measures that align with organizational and regulatory requirements.
So, wait no more and enroll in this online course and learn at your own pace wherever you are!
target_audience: Process engineers
Process safety engineers.
HSE (Health, Safety, and Environment) professionals.
Process design and operations engineers.
Safety instrumented systems (SIS) engineers.
Plant managers and supervisors.
Risk assessment and compliance officers.
Graduate engineers seeking foundational knowledge in process safety.

courses.title: How to be a High Performance Insurance Broker (Introduction)
courses.bio: The step by step system to turn your insurance practice into a high revenue generating machine...Relationship Management

Interview with a Peak Performer: Interview with Peak Performer Bill McCloskey

requirements: To successfuly complete this course you will need internet access, printer, and a mind ready for success
courses.description:
This is an introductory overview of our full course How to be a High Performance Insurance Broker.
How to be a High Performance Insurance Broker was designed for insurance agency principals and brokers to show you the exact steps to creating your practice precisely the way you want it to be. The course was designed to help you unlock all of the potential that you and your practice possess. This is the complete guide for insurance agency principals who want to maximize revenue, maximize profit, and enjoy their practice more, while not adding more hours to their work week. It has come out of the culmination of 11 years of working directly with agency principals on development and peak performance.
Here's what's covered in our full course


Part One – Vision and Strengths
In part 1, you will understand the importance of having a solid and compelling vision. You’ll learn why vision is the vital piece to begin reaching your highest levels of achievement. You’ll understand what vision is NOT and why most people fail to achieve their vision. And you’ll go through an exercise that will help you clarify your own vision. You’ll also learn why focusing on our signature strengths vs. working on our perceived “weaknesses” is a more effective way to be a peak performer.
Goals and Objectives:
- Understand the importance of having a vision
- Creating and clarifying your own personal and professional vision
- Dispel myths about vision
- Understand the importance of your signature strengths
- Identifying what your signature strengths are
- Using your strengths to reach your highest levels of achievement

Part Two – Talent, Skill, Confidence, Mind Management, and Resilience
In part 2, you will learn why self confidence is the single greatest predictor of success and how self confidence is developed. You will also learn how talent, skill, and self confidence all work in conjunction and in an endless “loop” to propel you to higher levels of performance. You’ll also learn why proper mind management plays the greatest role in your behaviors and outcomes and why, as we say, if you manage your mind, you manage your destiny. Finally, you’ll learn why resilience is necessary to reach your highest levels of performance and how to develop more of it.
Goals and Objectives:
- Describe the real meaning of self confidence, why it’s important, and how to develop it
- Understand what is meant by talent, skill, and self confidence
- Understand how all 3 work together continually in peak performers
- Understand the role mind management plays in our outcomes
- Have several methods for practicing mind management
- Understand the importance of having the characteristic of resilience
- How to develop more resilience and mental toughness
- Understand why mind management is the greatest determinant of success

Part Three – Relationship Management, Relationships with Yourself and Others
In part 3, you will examine your relationship with both yourself and others. You’ll understand why having a good working relationship with yourself is necessary before you can have solid relationships with others. You will learn how managing the relationships with others can be the best sales skill you ever learn. You’ll also understand the different styles of communication and the most effective communication style in relationship management. You’ll learn why relationship management is so important to being a high performance insurance practice.
Goals and Objectives:
- To understand and improve the relationship with yourself
- Understand how the relationship with yourself effects the relationships with others
- Understand how to use the relationships with others as a valuable sales tool
- To learn the different types of communication and what type of communicator you are
- To understand the most effective style of communication and how to develop and utilize it

Part Four – The plan, Goals, and Counsel
In part 4 “If it doesn’t get measured, it doesn’t exist”. In this course, you’ll learn the importance of accountability and keeping score. You’ll understand the importance of having a plan, goals, and behaviors and why they are necessary to be a high performance broker. You’ll see how goals play a role in our vision and the importance of proper goals setting. We’ll also uncover some myths around goal setting. You’ll also learn the importance of having good outside counsel if you want to perform at your highest level. Whether it’s a coach or a peer advisory board, solid outside counsel can become the most effective tool for problem solving and proactive solutions.
Goals and Objectives:
- To learn effective goal setting
- To outline the goals and tasks to reach your vision
- To create the plan that will make you a peak performer
- To understand the value of outside, unbiased counsel
- To wrap up all of the concepts we’ve discussed into your plan going forward
target_audience: Insurance Brokers
Insurance Professionals
Insurance Agents
Business Owners
Entrepreneurs

Introducción: Correccion de cintas en siguiente clase

Generando un artículo en base a simbologia
Dando conexion de terminal a los puntos de la macro 3D
Generando un accesorio de artículo: Generando un accesorio y pobando que está asignado corectamente
Imagen 3D del accesorio y probando que está ubicado correctamente
Creando un articulo mecanico: Convertir el tinkerdad en STP para Eplan, creando el 3D y probando

requirements: Conocimientos previos de Eplan Electric (curso Basico)
Licencia de Eplan P8, (para algunas secciones es necesario eplan Propanel, como son el 3D, vistas de perforación...)
courses.description:
Hola y bienvenidos a este curso de creación de artículos y macros para EPLAN.
En este curso aprenderás todo lo necesario para crear artículos estándares con todos sus accesorios, artículos personalizados creados bajo demanda, dispositivos eléctricos y componentes mecánicos. Como muchos artículos incorporan macros especificas, aprenderás también a crear diferentes tipos de macros y objetos contenedor.
Un objeto contenedor es aquel que tiene unos articulos y unas caracteristicas prederterminadas, por ejemplo, el arranque de un motor, seleccionando la potencia del motor, EPLAN te dará automáticamente el guarda motor y el resto de protecciones necesarias, olvidate de estar siempre escogiendo los articulos, deja que EPLAN lo haga por ti.
Seguro que alguna vez has ido a insertar un artículo en tu proyecto y no disponías de él en formato EPLAN, o sencillamente no estaba correctamente creado. En este curso aprenderás a crear artículos de una manera rápida, eficaz y eficiente, con todas sus funcionalidades, incluidos manuales, conexiones, etc...
Este curso ha sido diseñado pensando en los diferentes retos a los que se enfrentan diariamente los delineantes electricos
Al acabar sabrás crear artículos de todo tipo y las diferentes macros que EPLAN utiliza, además, tambien aprenderas a exportar e importar articulos en formato .EDZ para su uso en otras librerias.
Si quieres convertirte en un experto, este es tu curso
target_audience: Cualquier persona que quiera aprender de EPLAN electric P8
Cualquier persona que este considerando trabajar de delineante electrico
Freelances, CEOs, o cualquier persona que este considerando comprar EPLAN.
Personal de mantenimiento
Dirección de empresas que estén considerando implementar EPLAN en sus fabricas
Electricistas, ingenieros, técnicos,... que quieran ampliar sus conocimientos

courses.description:
يُعد تلوث الهواء من القضايا البيئية المهمة التي تتطلب عناية خاصة حيث يتسبب تلوث الهواء في البيئة الخارجية في وفاة 4.2 مليون إنسان سنوياً وفقاً لمنظمة الصحة العالمية، بينما يؤدي تلوث الهواء في البيئة الداخلية لوفاة 3.8 مليون إنسان، ووفقاً لتقديرات معهد القياسات الصحية والتقييم يُعد تلوث الهواء السبب الثاني للوفيات عالمياً.
وفي تلك الدورة سنغطي تلوث الهواء من منظورين رئيسيين:


أساسيات تلوث الهواء (Fundamentals of Air Pollution)
تعريف تلوث الهواء.
المصادر المختلفة لملوثات الهواء (الطبيعية والصناعية).
الآثار الصحية السلبية الناجمة عن تلوث الهواء.
الآثار البيئية السلبية الناجمة عن تلوث الهواء.


رصد تلوث الهواء (Air Pollution Monitoring):
الطرق المختلفة لقياس الجسيمات العالقة ومميزات وعيوب كل طريقة منها.
الطرق المختلفة لقياس الغازات.

التعرف على الحدود المسموح بها للتعرض سواء في بيئة العمل أو في البيئة الخارجية.
مكونات بناء خطة الرصد الفعالة (Air Monitoring Plan).
الأخطاء الشائعة في تقارير القياسات وكيفية تجنبها، ابتداء من مرحلة تجهيز العينات واختيار الأجهزة وصولاً إلى إعداد التقارير النهائية.
مقدمة عن نمذجة انتشار ملوثات الهواء (Air Dispersion Modelling).
التعرف على الواجهة الرئيسية لبرنامج AERMOD View.
التعرف على مؤشرات جودة الهواء (Air Quality Index) وتطبيقاتها في مختلف الدول، وكيفية حسابها.


التحكم في تلوث الهواء (Air Pollution Control):
الإزالة Elimination
الاستبدال Substitution
التحكم الهندسي Engineering Control
التحكم الإداري Administrative Control
مهمات الوقاية الشخصية PPE
دراسات حالة Case Studies

In this course, I will take you on an interesting journey with the Ministry of the health of Qatar, to master our pharmaceutical products registration there, let's practice regulatory affairs, registration, renewal, and variations with all its types, classification, case by case using actual examples from practice. As I always keep my theme in the pharma academy "It comes to you from practice".
In this course, we will cover all topics related to pharmaceutical products in Qatar, which will empower you to master the market. Then we will go deeper to see the actual forms, and templates, as usual, I keep the theme of the Pharma Academy that it comes to you "From Practice", and prepare the submission dossier together, ensure its verification, and interact with the actual system for the submission.
and we will end our journey, by landing the department of custom clearance, tracking /tracing system, barcoding, and 2DMatrix for all the shipments planned for the state of Qatar market importation. In addition to pharmacovigilance practice, the after-sale safety practice.
The system was first implemented by KSA the leader of the region, and then Oman, UAE, and Bahrain followed so far, and the others are coming soon.
And finally, congratulations to you for mastering pharmaceutical products registration in the Oman market and see you soon in the pharma industry my dear colleagues.
Let's go
target_audience: All levels of the pharma industry, starting from the fresh graduates till the highly professionals

courses.title: Quality Control in pharmaceutical industry
courses.bio: تعلم كل شيء عن رقابة الجودة في مصانع الأدوية
objectives: What is quality control in pharmaceutical industry?
How to prepare yourself for a quality control interview
Pharmaceutical products testing
What are the sections in Quality control ?

Stability Section: When should we perform Stability study ?
Form of products used in Study

requirements: no need for skills or experiences, it is already for fresh graduates.
courses.description:
صناعة الدواء من الصناعات الهامة و التي تحتاج إلى تأهيل جيد و كافي للعمل بها
من أهم الادارا ت و الاقسام الموجودة في كل مصانع الادوية هو قسم رقابة الجودة Quality control
دور قسم رقابة الجودة هو تحليل و اختبار كل مراحل تصنيع الدواء من بداية المواد الخام وحتى المنتج النهائي
يحتاج العمل في قسم رقابة الجودة إلى معرفة قوية بكثير من المعلومات ليتمكن المتقدم للعمل به من تحسين فرصه في الالتحاق و التطور فيه
لذلك هذا أول كورس يشرح بالتفصيل بلغة سهلة و طريقة مبسطة كل أقسام إدارة رقابة الجودة في مصانع الادوية و دور كل قسم
و فيه تفاصيل كاملة عن عمل كل قسم و عن الاختبارات التي تتم في كل مرحلة من مراحل تصنيع الدواء
الكورس يأهلك لأي مقابلة عمل في قسم رقابة الجودة في مصنع الادوية ويساعد في معرفة كل مهام و تقسيمات العمل في رقابة الجودة
و الأهم أنه مناسب لحديثي التخرج و لا يحتاج لأي خبرات سابقة لفهم و تعلم محتوى الكورس
الكورس مناسب لخريجي كل الكليات العلمية و التي يتاح لها العمل في شركات الادوية مثل كليات الصيدلة و العلوم بأقسامها


الكورس يشرح بالتفصيل اقسام
1st section - Raw materials and what should be analysed in material to approve it
2nd section - Finished products and what characteristics we test
3rd section - Stability section and how to perform stability studies
4th section - Analytical method validation, And how to validate the analysis method
5th section - General chapters and some analytical chemistry concepts important for QC lab
6th section - Instruments used in Quality control lab
target_audience: fresh graduates who are interested to work in pharmaceutical industry

courses.title: ISO 19011:2018 – Formation Auditeur Systèmes de Management
courses.bio: Apprenez les techniques d’audit pour évaluer et améliorer les systèmes de management selon la norme ISO 19011:2018
objectives: Maîtriser les principes de l'audit : Comprendre et appliquer les principes fondamentaux de l’audit (intégrité, approche factuelle, confidentialité, etc.),
Planifier, gérer et optimiser un programme d'audit : Apprendre à concevoir, planifier et gérer un programme d'audit efficace.
Réaliser des audits de A à Z : Développer la capacité à réaliser des audits complets, depuis la préparation et la collecte des informations jusqu'à l’analyse
Évaluer et développer les compétences des auditeurs : Connaître les critères d'évaluation des auditeurs pour constituer des équipes d’audit compétentes
Comprendre et appliquer les principes de base de l’audit de systèmes de management
Identifier et classer les non-conformités
Appliquer une approche basée sur les risques pour améliorer les systèmes de management
Conduire des audits à distance avec les techniques d’audit assistées par ordinateur (CAAT)
Gérer les interactions et les relations lors des audits

ISO 19011:2018 – Formation Auditeur Syst: Principes de l’audit du système de management
Objectifs, portée et critères de l’audit
Équipe d’audit : composition et critères de sélection
Ajout de valeur à travers l’audit
Exigences de compétence pour être auditeur
Exigences pour le responsable de l’équipe d’audit (auditeur principal)
Les organismes de certification et d'accréditataion
Conclusion du cours + Livres sur l'audit
Etude de cas : Audit Fournisseur de A à Z

requirements: Pour les débutants : Ce cours a été conçu pour être accessible même sans expérience préalable en audit. Les débutants trouveront des explications claires et progressives qui les guideront pas à pas, sans jargon technique, afin de leur permettre d’acquérir des compétences pratiques dès le départ.
courses.description:
Bienvenue dans notre formation approfondie sur la norme ISO 19011:2018 !
Ce cours complet vous offre une immersion totale dans le processus d'audit des systèmes de management, en vous guidant pas à pas à travers chaque chapitre de la norme. Il s'adresse à tous ceux qui souhaitent maîtriser l’art de l’audit, que vous soyez débutant ou professionnel expérimenté cherchant à affiner vos compétences.
Ce que vous apprendrez :
Chapitre 1 : Domaine d’application
Introduction aux objectifs fondamentaux et à la portée des audits de systèmes de management.
Découverte de l'importance de la norme ISO 19011 dans diverses industries, de la qualité à l'environnement, en passant par la sécurité.
Chapitre 2 : Références normatives
Exploration des normes ISO connexes et de leur interaction avec l'ISO 19011.
Compréhension de la manière dont ces normes complémentaires renforcent la cohérence et l'efficacité des audits.
Chapitre 3 : Termes et définitions
Clarification des terminologies clés pour garantir une communication fluide et une compréhension approfondie des concepts spécifiques à la norme.
Chapitre 4 : Principes d’audit
Étude approfondie des principes fondamentaux d’un audit réussi : intégrité, approche factuelle, confidentialité et impartialité.
Identification des compétences et qualités nécessaires pour mener des audits de manière éthique et efficace.
Chapitre 5 : Gestion d’un programme d’audit
Conception et mise en œuvre d’un programme d’audit cohérent, couvrant :
La planification stratégique.
La gestion des ressources.
Le suivi des performances et l’amélioration continue.
Chapitre 6 : Conduite d’un audit
Déroulement complet du processus d’audit :
Préparation : définition des objectifs et du périmètre.
Exécution : collecte des données et observation des pratiques.
Conclusion : formulation des résultats et gestion des non-conformités.
Focus sur les compétences en communication et la gestion efficace des relations avec les parties auditées.
Chapitre 7 : Compétence et évaluation des auditeurs
Critères de sélection, formation et évaluation des auditeurs.
Accent sur le développement des compétences techniques et des qualités personnelles pour garantir des audits impartiaux et constructifs.
Pourquoi suivre ce cours ?
En participant à cette formation, vous développerez une expertise complète dans :
La gestion d’un audit de bout en bout, du programme initial jusqu’à la rédaction des rapports de suivi.
La mise en application des meilleures pratiques internationales dans des domaines variés (qualité, environnement, santé et sécurité, etc.).
Approche pédagogique :
Études de cas pratiques : Analyse de scénarios réels pour développer une compréhension concrète des défis courants.
Exercices interactifs : Simulations d’audit pour appliquer immédiatement les concepts appris.
Support pédagogique complet : Accès à des ressources exclusives pour renforcer votre apprentissage.
Ce cours est idéal pour les auditeurs en devenir, les responsables qualité et environnement, ainsi que tout professionnel impliqué dans les audits des systèmes de management. Vous repartirez avec les compétences nécessaires pour exceller dans le domaine et apporter une véritable valeur ajoutée à vos organisations.
Rejoignez-nous pour maîtriser l’art de l’audit avec la norme ISO 19011:2018 et faites un pas de plus vers l’excellence professionnelle.
target_audience: Les auditeurs débutants qui veulent acquérir une base solide en audit et apprendre les étapes clés de l’évaluation des systèmes de management.
Les responsables qualité, environnement, ou sécurité cherchant à intégrer l’audit dans leurs pratiques pour assurer la conformité et l’amélioration continue au sein de leurs organisations.
Les managers de systèmes de management qui supervisent des processus et souhaitent mieux comprendre comment les audits contribuent à l’optimisation et à la conformité des opérations.
Les consultants en gestion des risques ou en conformité qui souhaitent offrir un service supplémentaire à leurs clients en auditant efficacement les systèmes de management.

Aucun prérequis technique n’est nécessaire, ce qui en fait une formation accessible aux professionnels souhaitant élargir leur champ de compétences et se spécialiser dans l’audit de la qualité, de l’environnement, et autres domaines connexes.
Managers et chefs de projet souhaitant mieux comprendre les processus d’audit pour améliorer la performance de leur organisation et garantir la conformité aux exigences réglementaires et normatives
Responsables qualité, sécurité ou environnement responsables de la mise en œuvre et du suivi des systèmes de management au sein de leurs entreprises.

courses.title: Investigación cualitativa en mercados B2B
courses.bio: Optimización del marketing para productos y servicios industriales y tecnológicos
objectives: Identificar los límites de las tácticas y estrategias de marketing tradicionales en los negocios B2B.
Conocer cómo la cultura influye directamente en el marketing y ventas de los negocios B2B.
Optimizar la estrategia de marketing a través de los métodos de la antropología empresarial y análisis cualitativo.
Conocer qué es la Tecno-Antropología y cómo aplicarla a negocios B2B de productos y servicios tecnológicos.
Aplicar inmediatamente nuevas metodologías de investigación cualitativa para refrescar las estrategias y tácticas de marketing.

Ejemplos de análisis cualitativo: Análisis documental en empresa de termotanques y grifería
Entrevistas semi-estructuradas en empresa de software de diseño
Diagnóstico de Madurez Tecnológico en una empresa de software de diseño

requirements: Se necesita experiencia básica en marketing y ventas de productos tecnológicos. Todo lo demás se aprenderá en el curso.
courses.description:
El marketing B2B de productos y servicios industriales se reduce con el tiempo a una serie repetitiva de tácticas y generación de contenidos: presentaciones en ferias, charlas y ponencias en institutos y universidades, webinars, workshops, clases de cortesía y demostraciones técnicas.
Con frecuencia se observa que estas técnicas de marketing y ventas, aunque hayan sido bien ejecutadas, no disminuyen los tiempos del ciclo de compra, ni consiguen explicar por qué algunos prospectos se comportan de manera diferente a lo que dicen durante las reuniones y etapa de seguimiento, o por qué la venta de algunos productos o servicios resulta particularmente difícil. Entonces, como opción desesperada, los equipos de venta recurren a los descuentos, entre otros acuerdos «gratuitos», cuyo costo termina absorbiendo nuestra empresa a través de una sobrecarga del personal técnico.
Llegado este punto de estancamiento, la empresa necesita de información de calidad. No solamente información cuantitativa, como número de ventas conseguidas, o la tasa de conversión de reuniones a ventas, o tipo de productos que se venden; sino información más completa, cualitativa, que emane directamente de la subjetividad del prospecto y cliente. Es desde la perspectiva del prospecto o cliente que han de optimizarse las estrategias y tácticas de marketing, además de las pautas de diseño o usabilidad de nuestras propuestas de valor.
En este curso explicaremos cómo se consigue esa información de calidad de nuestro mercado y cómo puede aplicarse en términos concretos en los procesos de nuestras empresas.
target_audience: Gerentes de marketing y ventas de empresas B2B
Directores, Gerentes y/o empresarios de empresas industriales
Directores, Gerentes y/o empresarios de empresas B2B de base tecnológica
Product Managers, Ingenieros de Aplicaciones, Ingenieros de Marketing, Technical Marketing Engineers, Gerentes Técnicos.
Desarrolladores y/o distribuidores de software y aplicaciones

courses.title: Diventa un orafo: crea anelli da zero - Tutorial completo
courses.bio: Diventa un orafo! Impara l'arte di realizzare gioielli preziosi ed esclusivi fai-da-te
objectives: Possiedi gioielli in argento usurati e senza valore? Ecco come e dove conviene far fondere il metallo per ricavare il lingotto d'argento.
Realizza il tuo primo anello con la tecnica artigianale orafa italiana: partiremo da un lingotto d'argento e termineremo con il prodotto pronto per la vendita.
Sei curioso di ottenere un prototipo in cera del tuo anello preferito con un budget di soli 50 euro? Ti insegneremo passo a passo come realizzarlo.
Desideri comprendere come iniettare il metallo fuso nel calco in gesso? In questa maniera otterrai un modello fedele al prototipo! Ti mostreremo come fare.
Modella 3D con comodi software il tuo anello e stampalo in resina con la stampante 3D. Ecco la guida per il miglior compromesso qualità-costo.
Guida alla lucidatura: come conviene lucidare l'argento per ottenere un risultato eccellente.

Introduzione ad oreficeria per tutti: di: Introduzione agli argomenti del corso: che cosa andremo ad imparare insieme
3 metodi per realizzare un anello in argento: metodo artigianale Vs moderno
Laboratorio orafo e filiera orafa: quanti e quali strumenti ti servono
Primo anello in argento: realizzazione m: Fusione di gioielli in argento in disuso: realizzazione lingotto di partenza
Purificazione del lingotto in argento e trafilatura: dal lingotto alla verga
Come mettere a misura l'anello partendo da una verga in argento: metodo facile
Lavorazione manuale con la raspa: trucchi del mestiere per realizzare curvature
Rifinitura e rimozione righe dall'argento con lime fini e dremel: molti consigli
Come lucidare l'anello di argento e pulizia finale con gli ultrasuoni
Secondo Anello in argento partendo dal p: Come produrre un modello in cera dell'anello a mano con pochi euro di budget
Preparazione del cilindro in gesso per la colatura dell'argento con la fionda
Fusione del bracciale in argento in disuso e fiondatura in calco in gesso
Estrazione dei gioielli in argento e relativa "spiantonatura" dal calco in gesso
Raspa e lima: pulizia degli scarti della colatura e messa a misura dell'anello
Lucidatura del secondo anello con la pasta abrasiva potente e di rifinitura
Terzo Anello in argento: 3D Design sempl: Design digitale in Rhinoceros di una fede con preparazione stampa 3D in resina
Stampa 3D con resina "castabile": processo fai-da-te e consigli pratici
Preparazione dell'anello per la lucidatura con le lime e dremel con carta vetro
Lucidatura finale del terzo anello con le spazzole lucidanti
Valorizzare il vostro anello in argento:: Cinematic oggetti realizzati: ecco i 3 anelli terminati ed in posa!
Idee per i vostri progetti made in Italy: diamo spazio alla fantasia
Che cosa farne dei preziosi realizzati: dove venderli ed a quanto
Come e dove proseguire i vostri STUDI e creazioni artistiche orafe

requirements: Imparerai da 0 (zero) l'arte di realizzare anelli in argento con 3 metodi differenti.
courses.description:
Sei un principiante e desideri imparare e realizzare il tuo primo anello? Sei nel posto giusto;
Sei un amatore e già realizzi gioielli nel tuo laboratorio casalingo? Approfondiremo ben 3 diversi processi per realizzare il medesimo anello (compresa la stampa a resina dei prototipi);
Sei un orafo professionista ma desideri aggiornare la tua tecnica con la realizzazione 3D e risparmiare tempo stampando i tuoi prototipi? Ti insegneremo il miglior processo in termini di tempo ed economicità.
Questo videocorso racchiude momenti di lezione teorica, alternati a semplici tutorial pratici. Sarete accompagnati nel nostro percorso dalla maestria ed esperienza di un maestro orafo, eccellenza italiana nel suo settore professionale.
Le lezioni propongono esempi reali e pratici per rendervi autonomi nella realizzazione di anelli in argento e valorizzare la vostra arte per farne gioielli unici ed esclusivi made-in-Italy.
In Italia, ci sono importanti città con numerosi laboratori orafi e taglierie di gemme preziose, per esempio Valenza, Vicenza e Milano, pronte ad acquistare il vostro gioiello.
Nell'arco dei diversi moduli diventerai un artigiano orafo. Questo corso è stato realizzato nell'ottica sia di permettervi di creare una vostra collezione personale di gioielli in argento da zero, da mostrare come portfolio durante il vostro colloquio per esempio, sia di monetizzare in parte o completamente i vostri gioielli appena creati, in modo da ingrandire via via il vostro laboratorio casalingo con i relativi proventi. Ci sono esercizi (con soluzioni), esempi pratici di prodotti lavorati e trucchi del mestiere. In questo videocorso vi insegneremo, passo a passo come realizzare il vostro primo anello in argento esclusivo. Sarete in grado di produrre con pochi e semplici strumenti il vostro anello personalizzato, grazie a 3 differenti processi artigianali e moderni.
Siete interessati a proseguire i vostri studi in questo affascinante settore? Dai un'occhiata agli altri videocorsi. Contattateci per partecipare ai workshop annuali e lezioni pratiche in laboratorio, in modo da approfondire le vostre abilità e conoscenze.
target_audience: Creatori di gioielli fai-da-te
Curiosi di oreficeria
Neofiti ed amatori

Orafi
Artigiani orafi
Professionisti orafi

courses.title: Como ser Fornecedor de Marca Própria das redes do Varejo
courses.bio: O Guia Completo para Indústrias de Alimentos que Buscam Escalar e se Destacar no Mercado de Marcas Próprias
objectives: Planejamento e desenvolvimento de produto
Auditória e certificados
Capacidade produtiva e infraestrutura
Marketing, negociação e expansão de mercado

Conclusáo e Depoimento: Conclusão, vale a pena ser marca própria?

requirements: Transforme sua paixão por alimentos em expertise. Domine as técnicas e regulamentações que impulsionarão sua carreira na indústria alimentícia.
courses.description:
Priscilla Truss vai te dar uma amostra do que você vai aprender e como este curso direto e prático pode ensinar sua indústria de alimentos a se tornar uma fornecedora competitiva para grandes redes varejistas, como Pão de Açúcar e Carrefour. Descubra como conquistar esse espaço com estrutura, estratégia e segurança, tornando-se a virada de chave que o seu negócio precisa!


A Priscilla Truss, Engenheira de Alimentos com mais de 10 anos de experiência na indústria e passagem por marcas como Taeq e Qualitá, mostra o caminho para pequenas e médias empresas se destacarem no mercado de marca própria.


O Curso para Pretendentes a Fornecedor de Marca Própria das Redes do Varejo é um programa completo que inclui:


Aulas aprofundadas: Conteúdo prático e direto para você dominar o assunto, com aulas sobre:
Histórias Inspiradoras e Introdução a MP: Entenda o mercado de Marca Própria no Brasil e no mundo, com dados e cases.
Planejamento e Desenvolvimento de Produto: Crie um portfólio competitivo, com embalagens funcionais, custo estratégico e apelo comercial.
Auditorias e Certificados: Saiba tudo o que você precisa para atender às exigências legais e de qualidade do varejo.
Capacidade Produtiva e Infraestrutura: Planeje sua fábrica, escalabilidade, automação e controle de qualidade para crescer com consistência.
Marketing e Posicionamento da sua empresa: Destaque-se em feiras, redes sociais e ações de relacionamento com redes compradoras.
Negociação e Expansão de Mercado: Aprenda a apresentar sua empresa, formar preço, negociar margens e conquistar escala.
Conclusão: Vale a Pena ser Marca Própria: Uma análise realista dos desafios e oportunidades desse modelo de negócio.
Mentoria exclusiva: Suporte e direcionamento com a professora Priscilla Truss para todos os alunos, para tirar suas dúvidas e acelerar seu aprendizado.
Conteúdo prático e voltado para resultados: Saia do papel e se torne um fornecedor valorizado no varejo.
target_audience: Essa prática é destinada a profissionais da indústria de alimentos, empreendedores que buscam desenvolver marcas próprias, estudantes de engenharia de alimentos, nutrição e áreas afins, e qualquer pessoa interessada em garantir a segurança e a qualidade na produção de alimentos.

courses.description:
Conheça as 5 principais ferramentas do setor automotivo:
- APQP - 2ª Edição - Planejamento Avançado da Qualidade do Produto e Plano de Controle;
- FMEA - AIAG-VDA - 1ª Edição - Análise de Modo e Efeito de Falha;
- MSA - 4ª Edição - Análise do Sistema de Medição;
- CEP - 2ª Edição - Controle Estatístico do Processo e
- PPAP - 4ª Edição - Processo de Aprovação de Peça de Produção.


Conteúdo:
APQP - 2ª Edição - Planejamento Avançado da Qualidade do Produto e Plano de Controle;
Conhecer o conteúdo de cada um dos seus requisitos e como devem ser aplicados na prática:
- Definir a Abrangência
- Capítulo 1.0 - Planejar e Definir o Programa
- Capítulo 2.0 - Projeto e Desenvolvimento do Produto
- Seção 2.13 - Viabilidade
- Capítulo 3.0 - Projeto e Desenvolvimento do Processo
- Capítulo 4.0 - Validação do Produto e Processo
- Capítulo 5.0 - Retroalimentação, Avaliação e Ação Corretiva
- Capítulo 6.0 - Metodologia do Plano de Controle


FMEA - AIAG-VDA - 1ª Edição - Análise de Modo e Efeito de Falha;
Apresentar os fundamentos e técnicas do manual complementar à IATF16949 para a Análise de Modo e Efeitos da Falha (FMEA) em sua 1ª Edição conjunta entre a AIAG e VDA;
Conhecer e aplicar os três tipos de FMEA:
- DFMEA – FMEA de Projeto;
- PFMEA – FMEA de Processo; e
- FMEA MSR – FMEA de Monitoramento e Resposta do Sistema


MSA - 4ª Edição - Análise do Sistema de Medição
Apresentar os fundamentos e técnicas do manual complementar à IATF16949 para a Análise dos Sistemas de Medição em sua 4ª Edição, visando a implementação e / ou manutenção de um sistema de medição;
Conhecer e aplicar os principais tipos de estudos na prática como: R&R, Tendência, Estabilidade, Linearidade e por Atributos;


CEP - 2ª Edição - Controle Estatístico do Processo
Conteúdo:
- Histórico e Definição de CEP
- Causas Comuns e Causas Especiais
- CEP e a IATF 16949
- CEP e o APQP / PPAP

- Análise de Estabilidade do Processo
- Padrões que indicam que o processo é instável

courses.title: ISO 6520 - Kaynak Hatalarının Sınıflandırılması Eğitimi
courses.bio: Kaynaklı imalatta ortaya çıkabilecek kaynak dikişi süreksizliklerinin neler olduğunu ve sınıflarını bu eğitimde öğrenin!
objectives: Kaynak Süreksizliklerinin Türleri
ISO 6520 Standartı Nedir?
ISO 6520 Standartının Yapısı ve İçeriği
Uluslararası standartlara göre kaynak süreksizliklerinin türleri ve kodları
Süreksizliklerin ortaya çıkış nedenleri
requirements: İnternet Bağlantısı
Öğrenme İsteği ve Yüksek Motivasyon
Herhangi bir ön şart yoktur !
courses.description:
Kaynaklı imalat ISO standartlarında özel bir proses olarak nitelendirilir. Bu nedenle de kaynak işlemlerinin de kalite güvencesi ve yönetimi için Uluslararası özel standartlar yayınlanmıştır. Kaynak prosesi sonrasında ortaya çıkabilecek süreksizliklerde ortak bir tanıma oturtulabilmesi amacıyla Uluslararası standartlar tarafından tanımlanarak sınıflandırılmışlardır. Bu eğitim ile kaynaklı imalat türlerinden ergitme kaynağında karşılaşabileceğiniz süreksizlik türlerinin sınıflarını, bu sınıflar içerisinde yer alan süreksizliklerin neler olduğunu ISO 6520-1 standartı kapsamında öğreneceksiniz.
Özellikle işletmelerde kaynaklı imalat bölümünde çalışanlar, kariyer hayatları boyunca bu alanlarda çalışma potansiyeli olan çalışanlar ve henüz öğrenci olup bu alanda çalışma potansiyeli olan (makine, endüstri, inşaat, metalurji/malzeme, otomotiv vb. bölümler) kişiler için yararlı önemli bir eğitim olduğunu vurgulamak isteriz.
Bu eğitimin kapsamı ;
ISO 6520-1 standartın temel yapısını ve içerisinde gruplandırılmış olan süreksizliklerin sırasıyla incelenmesini yaparak ergitme kaynaklarında karşımıza çıkabilecek süreksizliklerin standart içerisinde bulunan tariflerini katılımcılara anlatmaktır.
target_audience: Kaynaklı imalatta görev alan/alacak veya bu alanda çalışma potasiyeli bulunan yöneticiler, Üretim mühendisleri, özellikle kalite mühendisleri, imalatta kaynak koordinasyon personeli olarak görev alacak çalışanlar ve bu alanda çalışmayı düşünen adayların katılımı için uygundur.

requirements: No se requiere de conocimientos previos. aunque cualquier conocimiento previo relacionado facilitara la comprensión
Conceptos básicos de ingeniería.
Conceptos básicos de la ingeniería industrial.
courses.description:
El curso técnico está dirigido a bachilleres y estudiantes de primeros años de ingenieria quimica, Ingenieria de petroleo o Ingenieria industrial, asi como a todo participante que desee obtener los conocimientos técnicos básicos correspondiente a las características, funciones y especificaciones generales de los equipos principales que operan dentro de la industria de Petróleo y Gas.
El curso técnico toma como referencia a los procesos típicos presentes en una refinería de crudo como la destilacion atmosferica y la destilacion al vacio, se consideraron las unidades principales de procesamiento para la manufactura de productos combustibles.
En las refinerías de petróleo se usan además otros procesos auxiliares, como son unidades tratadoras para purificar tanto los líquidos como los gases producidos, unidades para recuperar el sulfuro de hidrógeno del gas producido y convertirlo en azufre elemental o ácido sulfúrico, estaciones de energía eléctrica, instalaciones generadoras de vapor y lugares para almacenamiento del petróleo crudo y los productos.
Cada una de los procesos u operaciones principales indicadas previamente, se analizaron en detalle para obtener la selección de los equipos que a continuación se definen.
Conocer estos equipos le ayudara al participante a tener una vision clara del proposito, las caracteristicas y las variedades de equipos que puede encontrar dentro de una planta de procesos bien sea dentro del sector petrolero, petroquimico, farmaceutico y/o de la industria de los alimentos.
target_audience: Estudiantes de primeros años de Ingenieria de Petroleo / Quimica
Bachilleres o estudiantes del ultimo año de secundaria.
Trabajadores de la industria del petroleo y Gas.

requirements: Acesso à internet e computador
Vontade de aprender pra se tornar um programador de torno cnc
Não é necessário conhecimento prévio de programação de torno CNC
Necessário conhecimento básico em usinagem
courses.description:
Seja muito Bem vindo ao Curso de programação de torno CNC
Neste curso iremos aprender muito a programação de torno CNC com o comando Mach, São mais de 80 aulas e cerca de 14 horas, que explica diversos pontos relacionados com a programação CNC, o que abordaremos?
· História e particularidades de um torno CNC
· Como são os meios de fixação existentes no torno
· Como Funciona um painel de comando Mach
· Quais são as Transmissões de Dados usadas
· Como Funciona o Sistema de Coordenadas, tanto absolutas como incrementais
· Como Calcular a Rpm, Velocidade de corte e potência de corte
· Como funciona as chaves de códigos para insertos e Suportes
· Como encontrar as medidas através da trigonometria, usando Pitágoras, seno, cosseno e tangente
· Quais são as funções miscelâneas e preparatórias no Comando Mach
· Como funciona a composição e estrutura de um programa CNC
· Como programar raios com a interpolação Circular usando G2 e G3, tanto com R ou I K
· Como programar os ciclos de Desbaste G74, G75, G66 e G67, e qual melhor usar em cada situação
· Como programar os ciclos de Canal e Faceamento G75
· Como programar os ciclos de Furação, tanto o G74 como o G83, e qual melhor usar em cada situação
· Como programar ciclos de Rosca Simples e Automático usando o G33, G76 e G37
· Como programar ciclos de Rosca com duas ou mais entradas
· Como Calcular a Altura e passe, bem saber o ângulo de uma rosca métrica
· Como Calcular a Altura e passe, bem saber o ângulo de uma rosca em polegada e cônica


Mas por que estudar a programação de Torno CNC?


Máquinas CNC´s são muito comuns hoje, presentes em quase todas as empresas de manufaturas de aço e outros seguimentos e hoje vivemos numa época em que as empresas exigem mais de funcionários, então apenas operar uma máquina, colocar e tirar uma peça já não é suficiente hoje para ter um bom emprego, sabendo operar e programar a máquina é um diferencial que com certeza irá te ajudar a conseguir uma vaga de emprego, uma promoção dentro da sua própria empresa como programador ou preparador de máquinas CNC.


Também profissionais que trabalham com projetos, no setor processo ou gerentes de manufaturas precisam ter um conhecimento de como se funciona uma máquina CNC, afinal como melhorar os processos de uma empresa sem saber como funciona suas máquinas?


Por isso é importante perguntarmos agora:
Estou preparado caso surja uma vaga de preparador ou programador CNC?
Se numa entrevista para processista ou gerente me perguntarem sobre CNC, saberia responder?
Pense... Oportunidades Aparecem, por isso esteja preparado.... Afinal conhecimento nunca é demais.
target_audience: Pessoas que desejam se tornar operadores de torno CNC
Pessoas que desejam se tornar preparadores de torno CNC
Pessoas que desejam se tornar programadores de torno CNC
Pessoas que desejam aprender como funciona um torno CNC

courses.title: Seguridad e higiene en ambiente laboral
courses.bio: Seguridad industrial, peligros, normatividad, Prevención de Accidentes Laborales, STPS, riesgos, seguridad
objectives: Conocer qué es la seguridad e higiene en ambiente laboral
Identificar el marco normativo de México sobre seguridad y salud en el trabajo
Aprender conceptos básicos sobre seguridad y salud en el trabajo
Comprender la diferencia entre peligro y riesgo
Conocer los fundamentos para la identificación de peligros

Módulo 2: marco legal y normativo: Tema 2: obligaciones de los patrones y trabajadores
Otras normas sobre seguridad y salud
Módulo 3: Identificación de condiciones: Tema 2: identificación de peligros y riesgos

requirements: No necesitas ninguna experiencia previa en seguridad e higiene. Aprenderás los fundamentos y todo lo que necesitas saber del tema.
courses.description:
La seguridad industrial tiene la finalidad de prevenir accidentes de trabajo por maquinarías y equipos que no generan una enfermedad ocupacional. Por otro lado, la higiene industrial reconoce, evalúa y controla aquellos factores contaminantes emanados del lugar del trabajo y que pueden ocasionar enfermedades, malestar o disconfort en el trabajo.


Así, de la mano, ambas disciplinas son fundamentales para proteger a los trabajadores y garantizar un ambiente laboral saludable. Cuando los centros de trabajo no implementan medidas para identificar los peligros presentes en su empresa, controlar riesgos, puede haber problemas económicos debido a que los trabajadores se incapacitan, incremento en las primas de riesgo o incluso el cierre temporal de las instalaciones.


¡Bienvenidos a nuestro curso sobre seguridad e higiene en ambiente laboral!


El objetivo de este curso es que adquieras conocimientos sobre seguridad e higiene industrial, aprendas conceptos básicos, el marco que rige la seguridad y salud en centros de trabajo ubicados en México, así como aprender a identificar peligros.


¿A quién está dirigido?


Trabajadores: para que conozcan sus derechos, obligaciones y cómo participar activamente en la mejora de su entorno laboral.
Recursos Humanos: para implementar políticas efectivas de seguridad.
Gerentes y supervisores: para liderar con responsabilidad, prevenir accidentes y cumplir con las normativas.
Miembros de comisiones de seguridad e higiene: para fortalecer su rol y actuar con conocimiento técnico.


Temario del curso


Introducción a la seguridad e higiene: Conceptos clave e importancia.
Marco legal y normativo Legislación mexicana: obligaciones de patrones y trabajadores, normatividad aplicable.
Identificación de condiciones peligrosas: Tipos de riesgos y peligros.


Como trabajadores tenemos la obligación de poner en conocimiento del patrón condiciones peligrosas para garantizar un entorno laboral seguro. No pierdas la oportunidad para generar cambios positivos en tu organización con nuestro curso de seguridad e higiene en ambiente laboral.
target_audience: Trabajadores de industrias y servicios
Recursos humanos
Estudiantes de ingeniería

courses.title: Produção de Sabonete Artesanal
courses.bio: Com os ativos Argila Branca, Babosa e Camomila
objectives: Formulação Cosmética e Produção de Sabonete Artesanal
Planilha de Custos da Formulação Cosmética contendo Argila, Babosa e Camomila
Introdução ao Estudo de Estabilidade de Cosméticos
Introdução a Segurança e Eficácia de Cosméticos

Estudo de Estabilidade de Cosméticos: Introdução ao Estudo de Estabilidade de Cosméticos ANVISA
Processo de Desenvolvimento e Estudo de: Desenvolvimento de Cosméticos e Introdução ao Estudo de Segurança e Eficácia
Formulação e Planilha de Custos: Planilha de Custos da Formulação de Sabonete Artesanal

requirements: Qualquer pessoa pode produzir sabonetes artesanais de qualidade com os conhecimentos adquiridos neste curso
courses.description:
O mercado da saboaria artesanal é uma excelente aposta para quem quer criar uma nova fonte de renda. A produção dos sabonetes artesanais é simples, não exige experiência ou muitas habilidades específicas, além de ter um custo bem baixo.
A glicerina atua de forma mais efetiva na penetrabilidade dos demais ativos e agentes de limpeza, tornando a higiene mais eficaz. As propriedades do sabonete glicerinado podem ter efeito desejado da mesma forma que os sabonetes industrializados, desde que seu processo de fabricação seja adequado e haja a devida aprovação por parte dos órgãos de controle e fiscalização. Entre as vantagens do sabonete de glicerina destaca-se a possibilidade de hidratação que mantém a umidade natural da pele. Este tipo de produto é indicado para pessoas com alergias e/ou pele ressecada. A glicerina possui ainda ação eficaz de hidratação e maciez da pele. Este efeito é potencializado por três ativos cosméticos disponibilizados em uma formulação exclusiva: Argila Branca, Babosa e Camomila.
Além de você aprender um pouco sobre a legislação preconizada pela ANVISA para o desenvolvimento de cosméticos, como o Estudo de Estabilidade para determinação da validade, e os ensaios de segurança e eficácia que devem ser realizados para garantir os apelos indicados no seu rótulo, o curso disponibiliza duas planilhas prontas com o custo de formulação e o lucro resultante. Praticamente você tem o negócio pronto, é só colocar a mão na massa. Lembre de usar os equipamentos de proteção individual indicados no curso para garantir a higiene requerida para garantir o controle microbiológico de sua produção. Não se preocupe, o curso tem uma aula prática detalhada para você aprender tudo!
target_audience: Pessoas que buscam um rendimento extra ou estão iniciando um negócio na área de cosméticos

courses.title: Relative Viskositätskurve (inmould viscosity)
courses.bio: Ermittlung der maximalen Einspritzgeschwindigkeit mit Hilfe der Relativen Viskositätskurve
objectives: Die Historie der relativen Viskositätskurve mit einem Bespiel der Schwierigkeiten der Datenermittlung in der Vergangenheit.
Einfluss der Scherung auf die Kunststoffschmelze bei der MFI/MFR Prüfung und bei Schergeschwindigkeitskurven die in der Mould Flow Analyse verwendet werden.
Die Wichtigkeit der Füllzeit für den Spritzgießprozess und wie die ideale Füllzeit zu ermitteln ist.
In der Praxis erstellte Relative Viskositätskurven mit Erklärungen und Bewertungen der Kurven.
Hinweise auf zusätzlichen Nutzen der Relativen Viskositätskurven für die Maschinenwartung und die Werkzeugoptimierung.
requirements: Interesse für die Prozesstechnik und Optimierung von Spritzgießprozessen.
courses.description:
Dieser Vortrag ist für Anfänger und Experten, die sich für Kunststoffprozesstechnik Spritzgießen interesieren und Prozesse optimieren müssen.

Viskositäts Kurve (inmoulde viscosity)
Einführung  und Kapitel 01 (öffentlich) Länge 19 min 49 sec
· Die Historie der Relativen Viskositäts-Kurve
· Ein Beispiel der Schwierigkeiten der Datenerfassung für die Erstellung einer Viskositätskurve in der Vergangenheit.
· Die Lernziele dieses Modules „Einstellung der maximalen Einspritzgeschwindigkeit mit Hilfe der Relativen Viskositätskurve“.
· Was wir in der Einspritzphase erkennen und beeinflussen können.
· Und Methoden der Füllzeitermittlung


Kapitel 02 - Länge 19 min 52 min
Thema Scherung
· der Einfluss der Scherung beim Aufschmelzen
· der MFI oder MFR
Die scheinbare Schergeschwindigkeit


Kapitel 03 - Länge 20 min 02 sec
· Die Füllzeit
· Die Schergeschwindigkeit
· Die Erstellung einer Relativen Viskositäts-Kurve.


Kapitel 04 -Länge 09 min 42 sec
· Die ideale Relative Viskositätskurve
· Hinweis auf Werkzeug Optimierungen und Maschinen Wartungsdaten (erkennbar aus den Relativen Viskositätskurven.


Kapitel 05 - Länge 26 min 06 sec
· In der Praxis erstellten Relative Viskositäts-Kurven mit Erklärung und Bewertung.
An einer der Kurven die möglichen Werkzeugoptimierungen und welche Wartungsdaten wir mit den Kurven generieren können.


Kapitel 06 - Länge 07 min 15 sec
· Zusammenfassung

Kapitel 07 - Länge 00 min 45 sec
Fragen und Antworten ist in der Basisversion leer

courses.title: PCP Avançado (21h)
courses.bio: Planejamento, Programação e Controle de Produção
objectives: Todos os conceitos relacionados ao Planejamento, Programação (Carregamento e Sequenciamento) e Controle de Produção (PPCP Avançado)

Integração de conceitos: Integração de MRP II e OPS

requirements: Não há pré-requisitos
courses.description:
Aulas gravadas ao vivo durante o curso online Líder-Especialista em PCP (PCP Avançado com Planejamento de Demanda e Gestão de Estoques).
Práticas completas de planejamento, programação (carregamento e sequenciamento) e controle de produção. Ambiente de manufatura com MRP (Planejamento dos Recursos de Materiais), MPR II (Planejamento das necessidades de manufatura), JIT (just in time), Teoria das Filas, , TOC (Teoria das Restrições), ETO (Engineer-to-order), PTO (purchase-to-order), MTO (Make-to-order), CTO (Configure-to-order), ATO (Assemble-to-order), MTS (Make-to-stock).
Carregamento vertical e horizontal. Flow shop, job shop, branched-flow shop. Programação finita, infinita, determinística e estocástica; Order Promising Systems (OPS com ATP - Available to Promise e CTP - Capable to promise).
Heurísticas e fragmentações; SPT – (Shortest Processing Time), LPT – (Longest Processing Time), EDD – (Earliest Due Date), LS – (Least Slack), SIPT – (Shortest Imminent Processing Time), LIPT – (Longest Imminent Processing Time), LWQ – (Least Work Next Queue), CR – (Critical Ratio), DLS – (Dynamic Least Slack) e S/RO (Slack / Remaining Operations).
Indicadores de desempenho: flow time / completion time, lateness / lateness médio, tardness / tardness máximo, makespan.
Controles com WBS, Gantt, Pert, CPM (Caminho Crítico).
Previsão de demanda, baseline forecast, métodos de previsão, indicadores de performance: MAPE, WMAPE, MAD, MSE
Cálculo de estoque de segurança e estoque cíclico; ajuste de estoques por nível de serviço e ponto de reposição.
target_audience: Todos os profissionais que atuam em PCP, compras, gestão de estoques, previsão de demanda, logística e supply chain.

courses.title: Band as Business, Musician as Entrepreneur
courses.bio: How to earn a career as a professional musician by composing, performing and recording the songs you love to share.

Copyright: Why Copyright Makes You a Business
Songwriting: Songs: The Center of the Universe
Music Production: Production: The Process and the People

requirements: A passion for music - writing it, recording it, performing it, or listening to it
An interest in the legal and business implications of music composition, recording, and performance
An interest in how the music business works and a curiosity about why some musicians make it and some don’t
courses.description:
How do I earn money with music? Every musician asks themselves this question at some point. Few receive an answer in the form of a career in music.
This course gives you all the answers you need to succeed as a professional musician.
Musician as Entrepreneur: Band as Business features over 5.5 hours of insightful video interviews with 70 of the top music business minds. We won't bore you with lectures. We offer only practical, specific, real-world advice from the likes of Jimmy Iovine, Glen Ballard, Irv Gotti, Jerry Moss, Martin Atkins, Ray Parker Jr., Randy Newman, Don Passman, Dave Stewart, Wayne Kramer and Lawrence Lessig, to name just a few.
Alongside the video, in-depth PDF lesson guides are provided to steer you through the course. Each section covers a critical component of the music career, and you'll find a book's worth of material to pore through. We also list additional online resources from Artists House so you can dive deeply into your area of interest.
The purpose of this course is to help musicians make money by understanding that the music they write, record and perform creates business and legal rights that will help them create sustainable careers.  It’s practical, it’s philosophical, and it’s determined to help you, the musician, and you the music entrepreneur, understand the legal foundations and business opportunities inherent in doing what you love.
How to think: Understand musicians, bands, and performing artists as businesses and the best practices available for their sustainability.

How to know: Understand excellence in respect of the production processes and the specific legal and business consequences of a musician’s creative work.

How to share: Understand the process and consequences of publishing, sharing, giving, licensing, distributing, selling, and marketing opportunities in respect of the creative work of the musician and the performing artist.

The way forward: Understand the processes for sustainability and continuity, the availability and role of online resources and outsourcing, and the importance of personal development and business growth.
target_audience: Beginners and young musicians who want to understand how the music business works and where they fit into it
Anyone interested in a career in music
Any musician, amateur or professional, looking for ways of making more money making music
Professional musicians and bands who want to move to the next level
Music teachers on all educational levels
Parents of children considering a career in music

courses.title: ISO 22000 Lead Implementer Practice Exams
courses.bio: Prepare for ISO 22000 certification with comprehensive practice exams covering FSMS implementation, HACCP principles
courses.description:
Are you preparing for the ISO 22000 Lead Implementer certification? This course provides a comprehensive set of practice exams designed to help you master the key concepts of Food Safety Management Systems (FSMS) and ensure compliance with ISO 22000:2018 standards.
Through a series of practice tests, you will gain an in-depth understanding of FSMS implementation, covering crucial topics such as HACCP principles, risk assessment, food safety hazard identification, and regulatory compliance. Each exam is structured to reflect real-world scenarios, helping you build confidence to tackle the certification exam with ease.
Key topics covered include:
Understanding the ISO 22000 framework and its application
Developing and implementing an effective food safety management system
Managing food safety risks and establishing critical control points (CCPs)
Preparing for and handling ISO 22000 certification audits
Achieving continual improvement and regulatory compliance
This course is ideal for food safety professionals, quality managers, consultants, and individuals looking to advance their careers in the food industry. Whether you're an experienced professional or new to food safety management, these practice exams provide valuable insights to help you achieve ISO 22000 certification success.
Enroll today to validate your knowledge, test your skills, and get one step closer to becoming an ISO 22000 Lead Implementer.
target_audience: Food safety professionals and quality managers – Individuals responsible for ensuring food safety compliance within their organizations.
Aspiring ISO 22000 implementers – Those looking to develop their skills to lead FSMS implementation projects.
Food industry consultants – Professionals seeking to expand their expertise and offer ISO 22000 implementation services.
Students and career changers – Individuals interested in building a career in food safety and quality assurance.

courses.title: Análise e Redução de Custos: Produtos, Processos e Serviços
courses.bio: Metodologias de análise e engenharia de valor aplicadas nas maiores empresas do mundo
objectives: Metodologia completa para redução de custos em produtos, processos ou serviços.
Analisar funções e características de produtos, processos e serviços
Compor a valor do produto, serviço ou processo a partir da importância que as características tem para o cliente
Tornar eficiente o valor dos produtos, processos e serviços
requirements: Não há conhecimentos prévios necessários para realizar o curso
courses.description:
A ideia de reduzir custos de uma empresa não deve ser uma medida utilizada apenas em momentos emergenciais do negócio. Deve fazer parte da estratégia do negócio para buscar sempre a melhoria, o aperfeiçoamento dos produtos ou processos e o consequente crescimento. Para isso, é preciso haver um planejamento e principalmente uma ferramenta ou metodologia que faça a diferença.
O curso tem como principal objetivo ensinar uma metodologia para realizar redução de custos, trabalhando em pilares que não reduzem o valor percebido pelo cliente. A metodologia utiliza como base a ótica do cliente sob percepção de valor, permitindo trabalhar nos itens que não são valorizados pelo cliente, tanto na sua função como em qualidade.
Envolve temas relacionados a características e propósito do produto relacionados a: função x custo e custo x valor percebido.
Por que agregar custo ao produto se o cliente não enxerga ou não dá valor para aquela função?
A metodologia busca reduzir os custos sem comprometer a qualidade ou o que o cliente espera do produto.
Junto a metodologia teremos um exercício prático desenvolvido numa planilha de Excel aberta para exercitar os conteúdos. Esta planilha serve como um guia para aplicação da metodologia e pode ser usada posteriormente nas atividades desenvolvidas de Engenharia de Valor.
target_audience: Analistas e profissionais que atuam na área projetos e engenharia
Analistas e profissionais que atuam na área vendas
Analistas e profissionais que atuam na área compras
Analistas e profissionais que atuam na área qualidade
Analistas e profissionais que atuam na área custos

courses.title: Smart TAB Production Course شرح نظام الانتاج لسمارت تاب
courses.bio: تدريب على نظام الانتاج لنظام سمارت تاب

نظام الانتاج: فكرة نظام الانتاج - البيانات الاساسية لاوامر الشغل
صرف الخامات - والتعامل مع المرتد - اتمام العمل
من مميزات نظام تاب: التحكم فى سمات والوان شاشات نظام تاب

requirements: لديك حاسوب وتستطيع استخدامه
You have a computer and you can use it
courses.description:
دورة تدريبية شاملة على برنامج سمارت تاب هو احد منتجات برمجية شركة تاب للحلول المتكامله وهو يعد من برنامج ادارة موارد الشركات لانظمة المخازن والمبيعات والعملاء  والمشتريات والموردين والاصول الثابتة والحسابات العامةوالانتاج وذلك فى حالة ان يكون للمنشأة نشاط صناعى وشئون العاملين والمرتبات  ومن خلال التدريب سيصبح المتدرب قادرا على استخدام سمارت تاب بشكل جيد والاستفاده من انظمته بشكل متكامل وفعال.
شركة تاب متخصصة في مجال إنتاج وتسويق الأنظمة المحاسبية و الإدارية.
قامت الشركة بخدمة العديد من الشركات المتباينة فى الحجم و النشاط الأمر الذى أثرى أنظمتها بوظائف عديدة ملائمة للوطن العربى و الافريقى. قامت الشركة خلال هذه الفترة بخدمة أكثر من 600 شركة بأكثر من 30 نظام مختلف.
للشركة العديد من الفروع على مستوى افريقيا و العالم العربى و تسعى الشركة فى زيادة أفرعها لخدمة العديد من المستخدمين الجدد.
برنامج Smart TAB  يعد احدى برامج ERP
تأتي كلمة ERP اختصارا لـ Enterprise Resource Planning أو تخطيط موارد الشركات , ويمكن أن تتخيلها كأتمتة لأعمال الشركات مهما كان نشاطها (صناعية , مبيعات , جمعيات خيرية , مستشفيات … الخ) .
إن أهم مايميز برامج تخطيط موارد الشركات عن الأنظمة المعتادة، أنها تعمل كنظام موحد متكامل (Integrated system)، وتتصل فيما بينها كوحدة متكاملة في جميع أقسام وإدارات المؤسسة أو المنشأة. أما الأنظمة الآلية السابقة فإنها لا تعمل كنظام موحد، فلكل إدارة نظامها المستقل عن الإدارة المجاورة لها، ويبدأ وينتهي عمل النظام في نفس الإدارة، فلا يستطيع الاتصال والتواصل والتكامل مع باقي أقسام وإدارات الشركة.
فتخيل مثلاً أن موظف يعمل كمندوب مبيعات في شركة ما, عليه سلُفة (مديونية) نقدية ويجب أن يُخصم من راتبه 1000 جنيه شهريا لمدة سنة , ولديه مبلغ عمولة يُضاف الى راتبه شهرياً بناء على حجم مبيعاته, و عليه عقوبات تأخير خلال الشهر يجب أن يُخصم من إجمالي الراتب.ERP_Consulting
سيقوم الشخص الذي سيصرف راتبه باحتساب ساعات تأخره خلال 30 يوما بالتنسيق مع شؤون الموظفين وبمراجعة سجل دفعات المالية للموظف لمعرفة كم هو مبلغ السلفة المتبقية عليه إن وجدت ليخصمها من راتبه , وعليه التنسيق مع إدارة المبيعات لمعرفة حجم مبيعاته لاحتساب العمولة … وهكذا لكل موظف.
هذا أبسط مثال يمكن أن يحدث داخل كل منشأة وأنت قس على ذلك من حجم الأعمال الأخرى ….
يمكن لأنظمة الـERP أن تقوم بما سبق بشكل آلي ومنضبط وبدقة متناهية .
هذه الأعمال تستنزف الكثير من الأوقات والأخطاء الكبيرة التي لا يمكن ضبطها إلا باستخدام برامج تخطيط موارد الشركات ERP .
ولكن تكمن صعوبة تنفيذ هذه المشاريع، أنها تحتاج إلى مزيج من الخبرات التقنية والإدارية ، ومن الخطأ أن يُنظر لها من منظور تقني بحت، أو منظور إداري بحت. ويجب دمج هذه الخبرات فيما بينها للخروج بمنتج إداري تقني يخدم أهداف العمل، ويساهم في سرعة إنجاز المعاملات في المؤسسة أو المنشأة. وهنا تكمن أهمية وجود الموظف الذي يعرف إجراءات العمل الدقيقة داخل القسم أو الإدارة التي يعمل بها ويتمتع بالحس التقني ليكون عنصراً مهماً في إعادة هندسة العمليات الإدارية (Business Process Re-engineering (BPR ، وفي كتابة الوثيقة (Request for Proposal (RFP التي تتضمن خطوات وإجراءات العمل الدقيقة وتحويلها من الإجراء اليدوي إلى الإجراء الآلي.
target_audience: مستخدمين سمارت تاب
Smart TAB users
Searchers for ERP systems for their companies
Accountants
الباحثين عن برامج لادارة العملية الانتاجية فى مصانعهم

courses.title: Iatf 16949 Ppap Apqp Msa Fmea
