courses.description:
Che cos’è il metodo Kaizen?
Noto anche come miglioramento continuo, il metodo Kaizen deriva da due termini giapponesi. Da un lato kai, che significa “miglioramento”, e zen, che si riferisce a “bene” o “benessere”.
Questo metodo si riferisce quindi al processo di miglioramento continuo di molteplici aspetti di un’azienda, dal livello macro a quello micro. Il suo principio si basa sull’idea che, apportando piccoli miglioramenti in modo continuativo nel tempo, questi possono portare a grandi cambiamenti nel lungo periodo.
Il Kaizen è un processo di miglioramento quotidiano alla ricerca del miglioramento costante dell’efficienza e passa attraverso l’umanizzazione del posto di lavoro, infatti nel metodo Kaizen le risorse umane sono centrali, I processi aziendali sono incentrati sulle esigenze del dipendente
le risorse umane sono centrali
I processi aziendali sono incentrati sulle esigenze del dipendente
Lavori ripetitivi e pesanti vengono eliminati favorendo processi automatizzati
In ambito aziendale, mettere in atto la metodologia Kaizen significa tendere verso un progressivo miglioramento dei processi produttivi e organizzativi mediante l’umanizzazione dei sistemi e il ricorso massiccio al lavoro di squadra. Nel metodo Kaizen, infatti, i dipendenti sono il fulcro del miglioramento continuo. Ma per poter essere gli artefici del cambiamento, la loro mente deve essere allenata all’autocritica, pronta ad imparare e a ricevere nuovi stimoli dagli altri e infine suggerire piccoli ma continui miglioramenti lungo il percorso. Un criterio distruttivo è antitetico alla filosofia Kaizen, l’approccio delle figure dev’essere al contrario di problem solving: non ci si può abbattere al primo ostacolo ma essere ottimisti al punto da cogliere opportunità dagli errori. Attuare il metodo kaizen in azienda significa altresì estenderlo a tutti i possibili processi ottimizzabili e misurare i progressi fatti con un approccio analitico.
Il metodo kaizen, improntato sulla crescita e sul miglioramento dei processi aziendali per mezzo dell’umanizzazione del lavoro, porta all’azienda numerosi vantaggi:
Migliora il lavoro di gruppo
Stimola l’apprendimento
Migliora l’autostima del personale
Aumenta la produttività aziendale
Ottimizza i costi di produzione
target_audience: Comprendere i vantaggi dello sviluppo sostenibile aziendale attraverso il kaizen

courses.title: ISO 14001:2015 – Système de Management Environnemental
courses.bio: Comprendre et mettre en œuvre la norme ISO 14001:2015, maîtriser les exigences environnementales, les audits internes et
objectives: Comprendre les enjeux environnementaux et l’intérêt stratégique d’un système de management environnemental.
Interpréter les exigences de la norme ISO 14001:2015 et leur application dans un contexte organisationnel réel.
Élaborer une analyse des aspects environnementaux, des risques, et des opportunités de conformité.
Mettre en œuvre, suivre et améliorer un système de management environnemental conforme à ISO 14001.
requirements: Aucune connaissance préalable requise. Le cours est conçu pour être accessible aux débutants.
courses.description:
Vous souhaitez améliorer l’impact environnemental de votre organisation tout en répondant aux exigences réglementaires ?
Ce cours vous propose une immersion complète dans la norme ISO 14001:2015, référence internationale pour la mise en œuvre d’un système de management environnemental (SME) performant.
À travers 10 vidéos claires et structurées, vous découvrirez :
Les enjeux environnementaux globaux (pollution, ressources, climat)
L’organisation et les principes de la norme ISO 14001
Le contexte de l’entreprise et l’identification des parties intéressées
Le rôle de la direction et l’importance du leadership
La planification environnementale (aspects, risques, objectifs)
Le support (compétences, sensibilisation, communication)
La maîtrise opérationnelle et la gestion du cycle de vie
Le suivi des performances, les audits internes et la revue de direction
L’amélioration continue et les actions correctives
Ce cours est destiné aussi bien aux professionnels HSE, étudiants, consultants, auditeurs qu’aux responsables qualité souhaitant intégrer la dimension environnementale dans leur entreprise.
Aucun prérequis nécessaire. Ce cours est accessible aux débutants motivés.
À la fin de la formation, vous serez capable de mettre en œuvre un SME conforme à ISO 14001, de participer activement à des audits internes et de proposer des actions concrètes d’amélioration.

Langue du cours : Français (France)
Niveau : Débutant ou Tous niveaux (selon ton choix final)
Catégorie : Business
Sous-catégorie : Management (ou Qualité si disponible)
Thème principal : ISO 14001 / Environnement / Management de la qualité
target_audience: Ce cours s’adresse aux professionnels HSE, aux étudiants, aux consultants, et à toute personne souhaitant découvrir ou renforcer ses connaissances sur la norme ISO 14001:2015 et les systèmes de management environnemental.

courses.title: ISO 13485 : Système de Management de la Qualité Médicale
courses.bio: ISO 13485 : Qualité, Documentation, Traçabilité & Amélioration Continue
objectives: Comprendre les exigences générales d’un Système de Management de la Qualité (SMQ)
Mettre en place et maintenir la documentation requise
Appliquer les principes de responsabilité de la direction et de management des ressources
Planifier, mettre en œuvre, surveiller et améliorer le SMQ

Chapitre 7. Réalisation du produit: 7.1 Planification de la réalisation du produit
7.6 Maîtrise des dispositifs de surveillance et de mesure

requirements: Ce cours ne requiert aucun prérequis formel et peut être suivi par toute personne souhaitant se familiariser avec les principes d’un système de management de la qualité dans le domaine des dispositifs médicaux. Cependant, il est recommandé d’avoir une connaissance de base des bonnes pratiques de documentation, ainsi qu’une familiarité générale avec le vocabulaire lié à la gestion de la qualité et aux processus d’entreprise. Pour tirer le meilleur parti du contenu, il est également utile d’avoir accès à un ordinateur et à un traitement de texte pour la prise de notes et la consultation des documents de référence.
courses.description:
Découvrez comment mettre en œuvre et maintenir un Système de Management de la Qualité (SMQ) conforme à la norme ISO 13485, spécialement conçu pour les dispositifs médicaux. Dans ce cours, vous apprendrez à intégrer les principes fondamentaux de la qualité et de la réglementation, en mettant l’accent sur la documentation, la traçabilité et l’amélioration continue. Nous aborderons en détail les exigences clés de la norme, notamment la planification et la gestion des processus, l’optimisation de la documentation, la maîtrise des achats et de la production, ainsi que la mise en place de mesures correctives et préventives.
Vous découvrirez comment créer et maintenir un Manuel Qualité efficace, élaborer un Dossier du Dispositif Médical complet et mettre en place des procédures robustes pour assurer la conformité et la sécurité du produit. À travers des exemples concrets et des études de cas, vous comprendrez l’importance de la revue de direction, du management des ressources et des audits internes pour maintenir la fiabilité de votre système dans le temps. Vous verrez également comment gérer les non-conformités, les réclamations et le signalement aux autorités réglementaires, tout en préservant la satisfaction de vos clients et en réduisant les risques pour votre organisation.
Grâce à ce cours, vous serez en mesure d’appliquer rapidement les bonnes pratiques de l’ISO 13485 au sein de votre entreprise ou de votre projet. Que vous soyez débutant en management de la qualité ou déjà actif dans le domaine des dispositifs médicaux, les méthodes et outils proposés vous aideront à mieux maîtriser les processus, à améliorer la qualité de vos produits et à répondre aux exigences réglementaires en constante évolution. À la fin, vous posséderez une vision claire et opérationnelle de l’ISO 13485 et saurez mettre en place les actions nécessaires pour garantir la conformité et la performance de votre SMQ.
target_audience: Ce cours s’adresse aux professionnels du secteur médical et pharmaceutique (responsables qualité, ingénieurs, techniciens, chefs de projet) ainsi qu’à toute personne souhaitant acquérir ou approfondir ses connaissances en management de la qualité des dispositifs médicaux. Il sera particulièrement utile aux débutants qui souhaitent comprendre les bases d’un système de management de la qualité, aux managers voulant optimiser leurs processus, et aux étudiants se destinant à des carrières dans les industries réglementées.

courses.title: Ganadería Sostenible Climáticamente Inteligente
courses.bio: Transformando la ganadería tradicional en sistemas productivos rentables y que promueven la biodiversidad.
objectives: En el curso aprenderás los impactos de la ganadería tradicional en las emisiones y el cambio de uso de suelo, la innovación y tecnología aplicada a la ganadería sostenible, sobre planificación estratégica de la finca ganadera para mejorar la productividad y promover la resiliencia de los sistemas productivos frente al cambio climático. De igual forma, se enseñarán las herramientas para tener un manejo óptimo de los suelos, pastos y forrajes para incrementar el peso del hato ganadero y reducir la huella de carbono, cómo captar, conservar y aprovechar el agua en la finca ganadera, aspectos como la alimentación y nutrición del ganado bovino, su sanidad y el uso de fuentes alternativas de energía sostenible.

Impacto de la ganadería tradicional en e: Ganadería convencional y su problemática para el desarrollo sostenible

El uso del estiércol de ganado bovino en la fertilización de los suelos
Las gramíneas de pastoreo y gramíneas de corte

¿Cómo manejar de forma óptima los suelos, pastos y forrajes?
El manejo de potreros en sistemas agrosi: Las cercas vivas en los potreros de mi finca
Los árboles en los potreros de mi finca

La alimentación y nutrición del ganado b: Alimentación suplementaria y piensos para la alimentación
Elaboración de bloques multinutricionales para el ganado bovino
Tablas de requerimientos nutricionales para el ganado bovino

El uso de fuentes alternativas de energí: Beneficios del uso de fuentes alternativas de energía

requirements: Profesionales de las ciencias ambientales y agropecuarias, extensionistas y funcionarios de entidades estatales relacionadas al agro y ambiente (ministerios de agricultura y de ambiente), oficiales de crédito de bancos, estudiantes universitarios y propietarios de fincas.
courses.description: La ganadería aporta un tercio de la proteína consumida en el mundo y es primordial para la seguridad alimentaria del ser humano, a su vez también aporta un significativo porcentaje de los gases de efecto invernadero (GEI) que influyen en el calentamiento global. En su informe de evaluación más reciente, la FAO estimó que produce un 14.5% de los gases de efecto invernadero de las actividades humanas a nivel global. El calentamiento global y sus efectos afectan la producción ganadera y en ese sentido, el presente curso tiene como propósito hacer más eficiente y productiva la actividad de forma inteligente ante el cambio climático buscando disminuir las emisiones de GEI, enmarcado en estándares y metodologías internacionales. La Asociación Nacional para la Conservación de la Naturaleza (ANCON), la ONG líder ambiental de Panamá, con el apoyo de la Embajada los Países Bajos en Panamá ha preparado este curso para profesionales de ONG, técnicos gubernamentales, extensionistas, estudiantes y finqueros con el fin de para prepararlos con las herramientas, la teoría y la información práctica necesarias para capacitar a otros o poner en práctica sus conocimientos para reconvertir la ganadería tradicional y sus grandes impactos globales en sistemas ganaderos con alta rentabilidad, reduciendo sus impactos ambientales negativos y promoviendo la conservación de la biodiversidad.
target_audience: Profesionales de las ciencias ambientales y agropecuarias, extensionistas y funcionarios de entidades estatales relacionadas al agro y ambiente (ministerios de agricultura y de ambiente), oficiales de crédito de bancos, estudiantes universitarios y propietarios de fincas.

objectives: GMP ve hijyen kavramı

requirements: Başlangıç düzeyinde bilgiler içerir.
Ön bilgi gerektirmez.
courses.description:
Farkındalık ve bilinç çok hızlı oluşmuyor. Hijyen konusunda temel bilgilerimiz olsa da kişisel, işletme ve ekipman hijyeni konusunda doğru bildiğimiz yanlışlar çok. Hijyen hassasiyeti olan gıda, ambalaj, ilaç, kozmetik ve kişisel malzeme üreten işyerlerinde çalışanların temel konularda sürekli eğitim almaları yasal ve standartların zorunlu gereklilikleri. İşletmelerin sürekli eğitim programlarına çalışan düzeyinde katkı sağlamak için tecrübeyle tasarlanmıştır.


Eğitim Çalışanların düzenli hijyen bilinçlendirmeleri için faydalıdır.


Tecrübelerimiz sahada personel eğitim içeriklerinin basit ve anlaşılır sunulmasının daha sonuç odaklı süreç sağladığını göstermektedir.


İçerik bilgisi daha çok yönetim sistemi standartlarına hakim olmayan ve işletmeye yeni adapte olmaya çalışan kişilere göre oluşturulmuştur. İlk defa bir yönetim sistemi çalışması yapılıyorsa mevcut çalışanlara sesli olarak videolar eğitim salonunda açılıp izletilebilir.


Temel olarak GMP, hijyen kavramı anlatımı sonrası bulaşma, alerjen, temizlik, haşere kontrol basit ana bilgiler görseller ile desteklenmiştir.


Anlatım basit ve tane tane çalışanlar için yapılmıştır. Eğitimi tekrar ederek kullanmanızı tavsiye ederiz.
Eğitim sonrası pratik bir test ile her çalışanın ne anladığı değerlendirilip, yeniden eğitim tekrarı ihtiyacına karar verebilirsiniz.


İÇERİKLER:
1. GMP
2. HİJYEN
3. BULAŞMA (MİKROP, FİZİKSEL, KİMYASAL)
4. ALERJEN
5. TEMİZLİK
6. HAŞERE KONTROL


Kurstan kareler ile konuların nasıl işlendiği konusunda özet bilgi sunulmuştur.


Aldığınız kurs herhangi bir "hijyen belgesi" sunmamaktadır. Eğitimi tam olarak izlediğinize dair katılım sertifikasını sistemden alıyorsunuz. Eğitimin işe yaraması saha uygulamalarınıza bağlıdır.


Not: Alerjen hem sağlık, hem de gıda tarafında doğru yönetilmesi gereken bir süreçtir. Genelde alerjen deyimi toz ve polen alerjisi olarak tanımlanır. Gıda alerjenleri ve bulaşma kontrolü örnekler ile anlatılmıştır.
target_audience: Hijyen gerektiren işyerlerinde çalışanlar içindir.
Gıda, ilaç, kozmetik, ambalaj ve kişisel ekipman (maske, eldiven vb) ürün üreten işyerleri çalışanları içindir.
Yeni işletme kuran ve hijyen kelimesinin temellerini öğrenmek isteyenler içindir.
Çalışanlarına GMP, hijyen, bulaşma, temizlik ve alerjen eğitimi aldırmak isteyen kalite yöneticileri ya da iş sahipleri içindir.

courses.title: ISO 45001:2018 – Exigences Santé et Sécurité au Travail
courses.bio: Mise en conformité et gestion proactive de la santé et sécurité au travail selon la norme ISO 45001 :2018
objectives: Comprendre les exigences clés de la norme ISO 45001:2018 pour une gestion efficace de la santé et sécurité au travail
Identifier et appliquer les meilleures pratiques de gestion des risques professionnels dans le cadre de la norme ISO 45001:2018.
Mettre en œuvre un système de management de la santé et sécurité conforme à la norme ISO 45001:2018 dans leur organisation.
Évaluer la conformité, préparer des audits internes et gérer les non-conformités selon les principes de la norme ISO 45001:2018.

Exigences ISO 45001 Version 2018: les Clauses Environnementales des Normes ISO

requirements: Aucune expérience préalable requise. Ce cours est accessible aux débutants ; une connaissance de base des concepts de gestion peut être un atout.
courses.description:
Ce cours complet sur la norme ISO 45001 :2018 est conçu pour les professionnels souhaitant instaurer ou améliorer un système de management de la santé et sécurité au travail dans leur organisation. À travers une série de chapitres détaillés – de l'introduction à l'amélioration continue – les participants exploreront les fondements de la norme, le contexte organisationnel, le rôle du leadership, la planification, le support, la réalisation des activités opérationnelles, l'évaluation des performances, et les démarches d'amélioration.
Au fil des modules, vous apprendrez à :
Comprendre les exigences clés et les avantages de l'ISO 45001 :2018
Analyser le contexte de votre organisation et impliquer les parties prenantes
Démontrer un leadership engagé et promouvoir une culture de sécurité
Planifier et gérer les risques pour anticiper et prévenir les accidents
Mettre en œuvre les ressources et supports nécessaires
Optimiser les activités opérationnelles en conformité avec la norme
Évaluer et améliorer les performances par des audits et revues régulières
Appliquer des actions correctives et préventives pour une amélioration continue
Ce cours s'adresse aux managers, responsables HSE, auditeurs, et professionnels cherchant à se conformer à la norme ISO 45001 :2018 et à renforcer la sécurité et la santé au travail au sein de leur organisation. Aucune expérience préalable n'est requise. Venez acquérir des compétences pratiques et stratégiques pour garantir un environnement de travail plus sûr et conforme aux standards internationaux.
target_audience: Ce cours s'adresse aux managers, responsables HSE, et professionnels souhaitant comprendre et appliquer la norme ISO 45001:2018 pour améliorer la santé et sécurité au travail dans leur organisation.

courses.title: ¿Cómo manejar un Montacargas y no morir en el intento?
courses.bio: SAFE: Seguridad al manejar un montacargas
objectives: Desarrollar habilidades y conocimientos en los que cubrirá al 100% todas las situaciones de maniobra al operar su montacargas en el manejo seguro
Obtener conocimiento para desarrollar sus actividades con los montacargas, cuidando su integridad, peatones, la carga e instalaciones.
Crear conciencia sobre el uso adecuado de un Montacargas y comprender la responsabilidad de su uso.
Obtener conocimiento para la carga adecuada de energía, sea montacargas eléctrico o de combustión.

Recarga y Cuidado de la Batería: Recarga y Cuidado de la Batería
Conclusión: Preguntas Frecuentes y Cierre de Curso

requirements: Tener conocimientos básicos de maniobra con el volante de un vehículo en general.
courses.description:
Curso para poder manejar un Montacargas siguiendo las medidas de prevención adecuadas y evitar o reducir los accidentes.
En el presente curso, el participante obtendrá toda la información necesaria para poder manejar un Montacargas con seguridad, aprovechando todo el conocimiento referente al Montacargas, su estabilidad, sus componentes y las medidas a seguir en las diferentes etapas de su utilización.
Objetivo General: Al finalizar el curso el participante desarrollará habilidades y conocimientos en los que cubrirá al 100% todas las situaciones de maniobra al operar su montacargas en el manejo seguro.
Objetivo Particular: Al termino de cada módulo el participante desarrollara las habilidades y los conocimientos para poder poner en práctica el manejo seguro de los montacargas.
Objetivo Específico: Darle al participante lo necesario para que pueda desarrollar sus actividades con los montacargas, cuidando su integridad, peatones, la carga y las instalaciones.
Enfocado para personas con interés de manejar un montacargas con todas las reglas de seguridad, tener conocimientos básicos de maniobrabilidad con el volante de un vehículo en general.
El presente curso no cuenta con una Certificación Oficial, pero ofrece los conocimientos necesarios para asegurar el bienestar del operador, sus colaboradores y de la infraestructura en la que trabaja. En caso de ser necesario
target_audience: Personas con interés de manejar un montacargas con todas las reglas de seguridad para cuidado personal y de su entorno.

courses.title: Mastering Body Scrubs
courses.bio: Techniques and Applications
objectives: Understand the Basics of Minerals:
Understanding Body Scrubs:
Ingredients and Formulations:
Techniques and Application:
Safety and Hygiene:
Client Consultation and Aftercare:

Hand Book: Student Handbook-Mastering Art of Body Scrub
Resources: Safety and Hygiene Checklist for Body Scrub Treatments
Client Consultation Template for Body Scrub Treatments

requirements: The requirements for starting an online course vary depending on the platform and the nature of the course. The only key requiremen is iontrest devotion and dedication
courses.description:
Welcome to "Mastering Body Scrubs"
Are you ready to elevate your skincare routine and learn the art of creating luxurious, effective body scrubs? Welcome to "Mastering Body Scrubs," a comprehensive online course designed to equip you with the knowledge and skills to craft and use body scrubs like a pro. Whether you're a skincare enthusiast, a beauty professional, or someone looking to enhance your self-care routine, this course is perfect for you.
Course Overview
Course Title: Mastering Body Scrubs
Duration: Self-paced learning with no time limits for completion. Estimated completion time: 4-6 weeks.
Objective: To empower students with the knowledge and skills to create and use body scrubs effectively, enhancing their skincare routines and offering professional-level treatments.
What You'll Learn
Understanding Body Scrubs:
Learn the purpose and benefits of body scrubs.
Explore the history and evolution of body scrubs in skincare.
Discover the role of body scrubs in modern skincare routines.
Types of Body Scrubs:
Identify different types of body scrubs, including sugar, salt, coffee, herbal, and specialty scrubs.
Understand the unique benefits and ingredients of each type.
Learn how to choose the right scrub for specific skin types and concerns.
Ingredients and Formulations:
Explore essential oils, carrier oils, and natural exfoliants used in body scrubs.
Learn how to formulate custom body scrubs tailored to your specific needs.
Discover DIY body scrub recipes and customization tips.
Techniques and Application:
Master the techniques for applying body scrubs effectively.
Learn how to create a relaxing and comfortable environment for clients.
Understand how to incorporate body scrubs into spa treatments.
Safety and Hygiene:
Learn about the importance of sanitation and hygiene in body scrub treatments.
Understand contraindications and precautions for body scrubs.
Master allergy testing and patch tests to ensure client safety.
Learn about equipment maintenance and cleaning.
Client Consultation and Aftercare:
Understand the importance of client consultation in tailoring treatments.
Learn how to assess skin condition and discuss treatment options with clients.
Master aftercare instructions and follow-up techniques to ensure client satisfaction.
Why Take This Course?
Enhance Your Skincare Routine: Learn to create and use body scrubs that suit your specific skin type and concerns, enhancing your skincare routine and achieving healthier, more radiant skin.
Professional Development: Gain the skills and knowledge to offer professional body scrub treatments, enhancing your career in the beauty and wellness industry.
DIY Empowerment: Discover the joy of creating your own body scrubs using natural and safe ingredients, empowering you to take control of your skincare journey.
Holistic Well-being: Incorporate body scrubs into your self-care routine to promote relaxation, stress relief, and overall well-being.
Who This Course is For
Skincare Enthusiasts: Individuals passionate about skincare and looking to enhance their knowledge and skills.
Beauty Professionals: Estheticians, spa therapists, and beauty consultants seeking to expand their service offerings.
Self-Care Advocates: Those interested in elevating their self-care routines with luxurious and effective body scrubs.
DIY Enthusiasts: Individuals who enjoy creating their own natural and safe skincare products.
Course Structure
The course is divided into six comprehensive lectures, each focusing on a specific aspect of body scrubs. Here's an overview of what you'll learn in each lecture:
Introduction to Body Scrubs
Understand the purpose and benefits of body scrubs.
Explore the history and evolution of body scrubs.
Learn about the role of body scrubs in modern skincare.
Types of Body Scrubs
Discover the different types of body scrubs, including sugar, salt, coffee, herbal, and specialty scrubs.
Learn about the unique benefits and ingredients of each type.
Understand how to choose the right scrub for specific skin types and concerns.
Ingredients and Formulations
Explore essential oils, carrier oils, and natural exfoliants used in body scrubs.
Learn how to formulate custom body scrubs tailored to your specific needs.
Discover DIY body scrub recipes and customization tips.
Techniques and Application
Master the techniques for applying body scrubs effectively.
Learn how to create a relaxing and comfortable environment for clients.
Understand how to incorporate body scrubs into spa treatments.
Safety and Hygiene
Learn about the importance of sanitation and hygiene in body scrub treatments.
Understand contraindications and precautions for body scrubs.
Master allergy testing and patch tests to ensure client safety.
Learn about equipment maintenance and cleaning.
Client Consultation and Aftercare
Understand the importance of client consultation in tailoring treatments.
Learn how to assess skin condition and discuss treatment options with clients.
Master aftercare instructions and follow-up techniques to ensure client satisfaction.
What's Included
Detailed Lecture Transcripts: Comprehensive notes and explanations for each lecture.
DIY Body Scrub Recipes: Step-by-step guides to creating your own body scrubs.
Safety and Hygiene Checklists: Essential guidelines for maintaining a clean and safe environment.
Client Consultation Templates: Structured templates to guide you through client consultations.
Aftercare Instructions: Detailed guides for post-treatment care and follow-up.
Certification
Upon successful completion of the course and assessments, you will receive a certificate of achievement, recognizing your skills and knowledge in mastering body scrubs.
Join Us Today!
Enroll in "Mastering Body Scrubs" and embark on a journey to elevate your skincare routine and professional skills. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced beauty professional, this course offers valuable insights and practical techniques to enhance your knowledge and expertise in body scrubs.
Enroll now and start your journey to mastering the art of body scrubs!
This comprehensive course introduction provides an overview of what students can expect to learn, the benefits of taking the course, and the structure and content of the course. It aims to inspire and motivate potential students to enroll and begin their journey to mastering body scrubs.
target_audience: Skincare Enthusiasts: Individuals passionate about skincare and looking to enhance their knowledge and skills.
Beauty Professionals: Estheticians, spa therapists, and beauty consultants seeking to expand their service offerings.
Self-Care Advocates: Those interested in elevating their self-care routines with luxurious and effective body scrubs.
DIY Enthusiasts: Individuals who enjoy creating their own natural and safe skincare products.

courses.title: Công nghệ sản xuất, lưu trữ, phân phối hydrogen
courses.bio: Hydrogen | Năng lượng hydrogen | Năng lượng tái tạo | Hydrogen energy | Sustainable energy
objectives: Quy trình sản xuất hydrogen sạch
Các phương pháp lưu trữ hydrogen an toàn
Các phương pháp vận chuyển và sử dụng hydrogen hiệu quả
Tiềm năng sản xuất hydrogen xanh tại Việt Nam

Giới thiệu: Nội dung chính của khóa học
Tổng quan toàn bộ chuỗi sản xuất,: Tổng quan chuỗi sản xuất, vận chuyển và sử dụng hydrogen sạch
Sản xuất hydrogen sạch: Sản xuất hydro lam (blue hydrogen) như thế nào?
Sản xuất hydro xanh (green hydrogen) như thế nào?
Lưu trữ hydrogen sạch: Công nghệ lưu trữ hydrogen sạch
Tiềm năng sản xuất hydrogen xanh tại: Tiềm năng sản xuất hydrogen xanh tại Việt Nam

requirements: Không cần kinh nghiệm gì cả. Chúng tôi sẽ giúp bạn bắt đầu từ con số 0
courses.description:
42 quốc gia đã ban hành chiến lược và lộ trình phát triển loại hình năng lượng này và 36 quốc gia đang trong giai đoạn dự thảo chiến lược. Hydrogen được coi là nguồn năng lượng tái tạo đầy tiềm năng để thay thế cho nguyên liệu hóa thạch đang dần cạn kiệt.


Bạn có biết rằng hydrogen đang trở thành yếu tố cốt lõi trong quá trình chuyển dịch năng lượng toàn cầu? Với tiềm năng thay thế nhiên liệu hóa thạch, giảm phát thải khí nhà kính và thúc đẩy phát triển bền vững, hydrogen đang mở ra một kỷ nguyên mới cho ngành năng lượng.


Khóa học “Công nghệ sản xuất, lưu trữ, phân phối hydrogen” sẽ giúp bạn nắm bắt những kiến thức quan trọng nhất về chuỗi cung ứng hydrogen – từ công nghệ sản xuất xanh, các phương pháp lưu trữ an toàn, cho đến hệ thống vận chuyển và phân phối hiệu quả. Bạn sẽ không chỉ hiểu rõ nguyên lý khoa học mà còn tiếp cận các xu hướng công nghệ tiên tiến nhất, ứng dụng thực tế trong công nghiệp và cơ hội đầu tư vào thị trường năng lượng sạch.
target_audience: Doanh nghiệp đang tìm hiểu về giải pháp giảm phát thải
Sinh viên đang định hướng chọn ngành học và công việc tương lai
Giảng viên giảng dạy về chuyển đổi xanh, và năng lượng
Nhà đầu tư tìm kiếm ý tưởng mới
Bất cứ ai quan tâm tới chuyển đổi xanh và công nghệ mới

courses.title: Tüm tüketiciler için elektrik fiyatları
courses.bio: Elektrik kullanan her tüketicinin tarife ve tedarikçi seçimiyle ilgisi bilmesi gereken önemli hususlar

Tarifelere giriş: Tek zamanlı ve çok zamanlı tarifeler
Tek terimli ve çift terimli tarifeler

requirements: Bu kursa herkes kayıt olabilir. Elektrik tüketiyor olmak yeterlidir.
courses.description:
Türkiye, elektrik piyasasını serbestleştirmeye devam etmektedir. Rekabetçi bir yapı da tesis edilmeye çalışılmaktadır. Ancak, bu süreçte özellikle de küçük tüketicilerin yeterince bilgilendirildiğini söylemek güçtür. Var olan bilgiye ise ya erişmek zordur ya da bilgi ve mevzuatı anlamak güçtür. Bu durumun doğal sonucu ise bilgi asimetrisi ve zaman zaman oluşan mağduriyetlerdir.
Bu mini kursun amacı küçüğüyle büyüğüyle tüm tüketicilerin elektrik fiyatları ve tarifeleri hakkında bilgiye erişmelerini mümkün kılmaktır. Kursun ücretsiz olması daha fazla kişiye ulaşmasına da imkan tanıyacaktır.
Kurs boyunca odaklanılan konular elektrik faturalarında yer alan bedeller, tedarikçi seçebilmeye göre elektrik tüketicileri, elektrik tarifeleri ve de son olarak tüketicilerin tedarikçi ya da tarife seçerken dikkat etmesi gereken hususlardır. Konular herkesin anlayabileceği şekilde işlenmektedir.
Kursu bitiren katılımcılar faturalarını ellerine alınca hangi bedelin neyi temsil ettiğini biliyor olacaklardır. Katılımcılar ayrıca hangi tüketici tipine hangi tarifenin uygulandığını öğrenmiş olacaklardır. Tarife tablolarına erişme ve bu tabloları anlama da kazanılan başka bir beceri olacaktır. En önemlisi de şu ki; kurs katılımcıları bir tedarikçiyle muhatap olduklarında neyi neyle karşılaştıracaklarını bilerek masaya oturacaklardır.
Kurs katılımcılarının konuları pekiştirmeleri için kurs sonunda çoktan seçmeli sorulardan oluşan kısa bir hatırlatma testine yer verilmiştir.
Sonuç olarak, bu mini kurs Türkiye'deki elektrik fiyatlarının tüketiciler tarafından anlaşılmasıyla ilgili mevcut boşluğu doldurmak için hazırlanmıştır.  Bi yandan da daha fazla insanın elektrik tarifeleriyle ilgili bilgi ve materyale erişimini mümkün kılmak amaçlanmıştır.
target_audience: Tüm elektrik tüketicileri

courses.title: 【FX】インジケーター不要！マルチタイムフレーム分析とダウ理論だけで勝率を高めろ！
courses.bio: MTF分析とダウ理論さえ理解すれば値動きの本質が分かってくる
objectives: ダウ理論を理解し、チャートを見る力を養います
マルチフレーム分析を理解し、チャートの方向性を理解する力を養います
上位足から短期足に落とし込み、エントリーするタイミングや利確のタイミングが理解できます
ダウ理論とラインのみを用いたデイトレード、スキャルピングの手法が理解できます
requirements: 【必須】パソコン
【必須】MT4：FXのチャートを分析等するための無料専用ソフト（当HPにリンクあり）
【任意】Forex Tester：FXの過去検証を行うための有料専用ソフト（当HPにリンクあり）
courses.description:
初めにお伝えしますが、本コースの内容を理解するためには勉強が必要です。FXをこれから始める初心者であれば、実践トレードができるまでに毎日２時間で３か月はかかるかと想定しております。
FXは「〇〇を使うだけで勝てる！」「〇〇を使って必勝スキャルピング」などという「楽して勝てる」ものではありません。
ですので、FXは楽して稼げると勘違いしている方はコースの受講はお控えください。


本コースでは「解説」⇒「チャートを動かして模擬トレード」という流れで行い、セクション毎に宿題を出しております。
見るだけで理解できるほどFXは甘くなく、チャートと向き合った時間だけFXが上達しますので、時間をかけてじっくりとFXで勝てる力を身に着けていってください。（本コースは初級～中級者向けに作成しています。）
target_audience: FXで勝てていない初心者トレーダー
これから隙間時間に副業で収入を得たいと思っている方

courses.title: Supervivencia en ambientes hostiles y gestión de riesgo
courses.bio: Seguridad Personal y Prevención de Riesgos
objectives: Conocer e identificar las amenazas comunes para una persona en materia de seguridad.
Mejorar tus habilidades de reacción ante posibles escenarios de inseguridad.
Conocerás las medidas preventivas básicas para disminuir la posibilidad de ser víctima de la delincuencia.
Aplicarás técnicas prácticas y fáciles de desarrollar para gestionar riegos y afrontar circunstancias difíciles.
requirements: No hay requisitos para tomar este curso. Abierto totalmente.
courses.description:
¿Qué vas a lograr?
Mejorar tus habilidades de reacción ante posibles escenarios de inseguridad y de esta forma disminuir la posibilidad de ser víctima de la delincuencia mediante una adecuada evaluación de riesgo durante tu viaje o en la zona en que vivas.


¿Cómo lo vas a lograr?
A través de los siguientes módulos y lecciones conocerás las medidas preventivas básicas para disminuir la posibilidad de ser víctima de la delincuencia, aplicaras técnicas prácticas y fáciles de desarrollar para gestionar riegos y afrontar circunstancias difíciles.


Este programa de certificación incluye 12 lecciones en línea, 3 recursos adicionales en video, 2 PDFs, 3 páginas de internet sobre prevención y seguridad durante tus viajes, así como una recomendación de profesionales de seguridad y un test para que evalúe sus conocimientos adquiridos, la cual puede tomar fácilmente en su teléfono móvil, tableta o computadora. Cada curso incluye una versión PDF descargable para su lectura fuera de línea.


Los temas incluyen: técnicas de mitigación de riesgos; procedimientos para prepararse y reducir los riesgos; modos de comunicación; minimización de vulnerabilidades y sesgos; reducción de riesgos al vivir o trabajar en áreas de gran peligro; y técnicas tanto para evitar como responder a las situaciones de peligro y violencia.
target_audience: Abierto a todas las personas que tengan el objetivo de disminuir los riesgos de su persona ante posibles escenarios de inseguridad.

courses.title: Conserto de fonte de tv - Curso completo
courses.bio: Eletrônica de manutenção. Reparo de placas fonte de tv lcd. Não descarte mais suas placas. Power supply tv repair.
objectives: Identificar quando o defeito é na fonte da tv ou em outro circuito
Conhecer a placa fonte e saber como testá-la
Conhecer os circuitos da placa, entender como funcionam e como diagnosticar defeitos
Fazer o reparo na placa fonte de maneira correta
requirements: Desejável ter conhecimento básico de eletrônica
courses.description:
Muitos técnicos trabalham com conserto de TV, apenas trocando a placa que apresenta defeito. Isto é um erro, visto que todas as placas da TV tem chance de conserto, e a que tem maior chance é sem dúvida a placa da fonte. E na maioria dos casos o custo do conserto é de apenas alguns centavos ou poucos reais, ou até mesmo, em alguns casos, é possível consertar sem gastar absolutamente nada. Sem contar que é mais rápido, pois quando se compra a placa pela internet, é preciso aguardar o prazo de entrega, que às vezes pode ser dias ou até semanas. O conserto pode ser feito em poucos minutos, agilizando muito a entrega do aparelho ao cliente. Sem contar que nem sempre se encontra a placa para substituição e neste caso o conserto é obrigatório.
Neste curso você vai aprender com facilidade a consertar placas de fonte e led driver de TVs, vamos estudar como funciona cada circuito, como ligar as placas fora da TV, como testar e diagnosticar os mais variados defeitos em placas de fonte e led driver. Teremos como base de estudo duas placas de fonte de TV de duas das maiores fabricantes mundiais, Philips e AOC. Com base nestas placas você terá todo o conhecimento necessário para lidar com qualquer placa de fonte de TV. Poderá ainda baixar os esquemas das placas e os datasheets traduzidos dos circuitos integrados usados nestas placas, para facilitar a compreensão. Um curso enxuto e ao mesmo tempo completo, com a qualidade e o preço baixo que só aqui você encontra.
target_audience: Técnicos em eletrônica, estudantes de eletrônica ou mesmo hobistas

courses.title: OEE Simples
courses.bio: Aprenda de forma simples e rápida o conceito de OEE e como conhecê-lo a fundo pode ajudar a aumentar a produtividade.
objectives: Conhecer os principais aspectos da manufatura que utiliza máquinas para agregar valor
Conhecer as perdas de uma máquina, a maneira como acontecem e como prejudicam a produtividade
Entender que o OEE é muito mais que um indicador: é uma forma de gestão de equipamentos.
Entender os conceitos, calcular e melhorar a eficiência de máquinas através do OEE

Capítulo 2: Tipos de Perdas dos Equipame: Tipos de Atividades e Perdas de Disponibilidade de Uma Máquina

requirements: Trabalhar ou ter interesse de trabalhar em empresas de manufatura
courses.description: O curso OEE Simples, desenvolvido pela DataLean em parceria com a Udemy, quer ajudá-lx a entender o conceito da Eficiência Global do Equipamento, para que você possa aplica-lo rapidamente na sua máquina e assim, contribuir de maneira protagonista no aumento de produtividade. É um curso preparado com base na experiência de vinte e sete anos no chão de fábrica, entendendo, treinando e aplicando o OEE como estratégia de melhoria dos equipamentos na manufatura. Este curso rápido e simples, pode ser o diferencial para sua carreira e seus resultados na manufatura. Usar o OEE somente com um indicador, é o que a maioria faz, mas sem alcançar muito resultado. Este curso vai ajudar a entender os principais conceitos do que realmente é ter a visão global de um equipamento, que não é somente calcular a sua eficiência, mas sim, saber quais são os eventos que alteram a produtividade do equipamento, e como esses eventos influenciam no fatores fundamentais que compõem o OEE: Disponibilidade, Performance e Qualidade. Após nos aprofundarmos nos conceitos, vamos também aprender os cálculos básicos e fazer exercícios que vão lhe ajudar a entender completamente o conceito do OEE, com dicas de como começar e investir em um sistema de coleta de dados para as máquinas da sua empresa. Não perca tempo! Venha comigo aprender OEE na teoria e na prática.
target_audience: Pessoas ligadas a Produção na Manufatura, que conduzam ou sejam responsáveis por melhorar equipamentos de produção

courses.title: NR-35 (Extensão)
courses.bio: Norma Regulamentadora 35(NR 35)
objectives: Conhecimentos sobre a norma NR-35 relativa aos trabalhos em altura.
requirements: Não.
courses.description:
A Norma Regulamentadora 35, ou apenas NR 35, estabelece os requisitos mínimos de proteção para o trabalho em altura, envolvendo o planejamento, a organização e a execução.
Aprenda sobre a Norma Regulamentadora 35 e gere seu certificado ao final. Conheça os principais aspectos envolvendo trabalho em altura. Aumente seu conhecimento e sua segurança para execução de trabalhos em altura.
É um curso de extensão e orientação. O conteúdo é o mesmo do curso oficial, porém não contém a carga horária mínima determinada pela norma.
O certificado emitido ao final é apenas uma formalização da Udemy que você cumpriu as aulas do curso. Não é um certificado para apresentar nas empresas como comprovação de treinamento.
O objetivo do treinamento é entregar ao aluno, um material completo sobre o tema, com as vídeo-aulas e ao final, propiciar o conhecimento necessário ao estudante sobre o tema.
O treinamento não tem o objetivo de substituir o curso oficial. Visa apenas a ajudar ao aluno na compreensão do tema e aumentar o conhecimento do aluno acerca da norma e seus detalhes.
Para a certificação oficial, recomendamos um treinamento de uma instituição oficial que ofereça o treinamento com carga horária oficial e ao final, forneça o certificado válido para apresentação nas empresas e ter a habilitação necessária para atuar de acordo com a norma.
target_audience: Profissionais da indústria.

courses.title: Instalator pentru sisteme termice solare
courses.bio: Sistemele termice solare fac parte din domeniul surselor regenerabile de energie
requirements: Participanții trebuis să poată opera la calculator și să aibă cunoștințe de bază în domeniul instalațiilor de apă rece și caldă
courses.description:
Cursul este destinat pentru cei cointeresați de instalațiile ce utilizează energia solară și tendințele de utilizare a acesteia. Energia solară tinde să fie din ce în ce mai raspandită, datorită crizei resurselor tradiționale de energie dar și datorită influenței acestora asupra mediul înconjurător. Pentru a înețelege mai ușor de către cursanți care sunt procesele de transformare a energiei solare în energie electrică, dar și cum se poate de constituit o instalație fotovoltaică s-a propus crearea unui curs destinat instalatorilor de sisteme termice solare. Cursul cuprinde 6 capitole, fiecare capitol cuprinde atat teme teoretice cat și lucrări practice. Pentru o bună înțelegere a materialului teoretic, pentru curs au fost selectate și secvențe video unde se prezintă unele aspecte legate de instalațiile termice solare. Pentru completarea cunoștințelor, cursanților li se propune și suport teoretic. La finele fiecărui capitol se va parcurge un test pentru verificarea cunoștințelor acumulate. La sfârşitul programului de specializare, cursanţii absolvenţi vor fi capabili să analizeze şi să instaleze un sistem termic solar, să întreţină un sistem termic solar şi să propună soluţii adaptate clientului pe baza analizei pieţei şi a raportului cost/beneficiu.
Evaluarea cursanţilor se va face atât pe parcursul pregătirii prin teme, studii de caz, teste şi probe practice, cât şi la finalul pregătirii, prin examen scris şi practic.
target_audience: Cursul este destinat pentru cei cointeresați de energia solară și tendințele de utilizare a acesteia pentru producerea apei calde. Energia solară tinde să fie din ce în ce mai raspandită, datorită crizei resurselor tradiționale de energie dar și datorită influenței acestora asupra mediul înconjurător. Pentru a înețelege mai ușor de către participanți la curs, care sunt procesele de transformare a energiei solare în energie termică - apă caldă, dar și cum se poate de constituit o instalație termică solară s-a propus crearea unui curs destinat Instalatorilor de sisteme termice solare. Cursul cuprinde 6 capitole, fiecare capitol cuprinde atat teme teoretice cat și lucrări practice. Pentru o bună înțelegere a materialului teoretic, pentru curs au fost selectate și secvențe video unde se prezintă unele aspecte cu referire de instalațiile termice solare. Pentru completarea cunoștințelor, participanților li se propune și suport teoretic. La finele fiecărui capitol se va parcurge un test pentru verificarea cunoștințelor acumulate. La sfârşitul programului de specializare, cursanţii absolvenţi vor fi capabili să proiecteze şi să instaleze un sistem termic solar, să-și organizeze locul de muncă, să dimensioneze o instalație termică solară, să execute lucrări de conexiune electrică, să execute lucrări de întreținere și reparații. Să propună soluţii adaptate clientului pe baza analizei pieţei şi a raportului cost/beneficiu. Evaluarea cursanţilor se va face atât pe parcursul pregătirii prin teme, teste şi probe practice, cât şi la finalul pregătirii, prin examen scris şi practic.

図面が読めれば今から始められる、モノづくり講座です！　まずは無償で使える「Fusion 360」を使って機械設計やCADのオペレーションの基本を学びましょう。Vol.1では、まずFusion 360についての概要について紹介します。次に、モデリングを実際にやってみましょう。今回はソリッドとサーフェス（パッチ）のモデリングの基本的なところについて説明します。

courses.title: Cómo es la Mejor Educación en el Mundo
courses.bio: Una visión general sobre los sistemas educativos de los países de más alto desempeño en pruebas internacionales.
objectives: Conocer la utilidad de las pruebas estandarizadas de desempeño educativo que se aplican a nivel internacional, especialmente PISA.
Comprender qué nos dice (y qué no nos dice) PISA en el marco de la educación comparada.
Obtener una visión general de las mejores prácticas educativas a nivel mundial.
Disfrutar de un breve recorrido por nueve de los países con mejor desempeño en PISA.

La mejor educación en el mundo: Introducción: La Educación alrededor del Mundo
Evaluaciones internacionales: PISA, TIMSS y PIRLS
¿Cómo es la mejor educación en el mundo?
La mejor educación en el mundo
Visión General: Visión General: Finlandia, Corea del S, Singapur, China, Nueva Zelanda y Escocia

requirements: Ninguno.
courses.description: Acompaña al Dr. Eduardo Andere, analista y escritor, especialista en educación comparada, en su viaje alrededor del mundo para estudiar los sistemas educativos de los países con más alto desempeño en PISA. En esta conferencia se analizará la utilidad y alcance de las pruebas estandarizadas internacionales. Así mismo, se presentarán las características más relevantes de los sistemas educativos de alto desempeño y su ubicación en la geografía de la educación mundial. Las personas que vean esta conferencia podrán brevemente conocer la enorme diferencia en culturas, políticas y procesos educativos, y aprenderán que la educación comparada en el nivel intencional juega un papel doble: por un lado es un terreno fértil de experiencias; por otro, una oportunidad de reflexión sobre la complejidad de los temas educativo y de aprendizaje. No hay un camino sino varios de elevar la calidad educativa. Nadie tiene un fórmula secreta de la calidad de la educación. Dicho en términos coloquiales: “there is more than one way to skin a cat”. (“Hay más una manera de esquilar un gato”).
target_audience: Maestros, educadores, directores de escuela, supervisores, autoridades educativas, padres de familia, y general personas interesadas en la educación.

courses.title: 【コンサル転職・就活】Big4＋アクセンチュア内定のためののケース面接・フェルミ推定対策
courses.bio: これだけれやば完成戦略コンサル内定者が”ガチ”でBig４のケース面接・フェルミ推定を徹底解説
objectives: コンサルティング業界の転職・就活で出題されるケース面接・フェルミ推定の出題の傾向と対策を学ぶことが可能です
Big4(PwC＋デロイト＋EY＋KPMG）とアクセンチュアのケース面接で合格できるレベルのケース面接＋フェルミ推定のスキルが学べます
問題解決に必要なロジカルシンキングや実際の面接で聞かれる想定質問や施策の考え方を徹底的に学べます
現役戦略コンサルタントであるなすがどのような思考で問題解決を行うのかをケースで実践的に学ぶことができます

ケース面接・フェルミ推定の基礎と極意: 本コンテンツの目的とゴール
#0.フェルミ推定の基礎と4つの型
実録・フェルミ推定【基礎編】: #2_銀座のスターバックスコーヒーの売上と売上向上施策
#3_サッカースパイクの市場規模
#4_トルコのトマトの市場規模
実録・フェルミ推定【応用編】: #5_農業用トラクターの市場規模
#6_長期インターンの市場規模と参入要否
#7_恵比寿の高級バーの売上と利益
#8_国内自動車の売上と売上向上施策
#9_三鷹の住宅街にある花屋の売上と売上向上施策

requirements: コンサル就活・転職を考えている人が最初のレベルから内定レベルになるまでを支援します
courses.description:
皆さんこんにちは。なすです。現在は戦略コンサルタントとして、日々経営戦略を考えたり、新規事業を考えたりしています。
このnoteは”この1冊（10本の動画）で、みなさんにbig4や戦コン内定レベルのケース・フェルミ推定力をつけてもらう”ために作りました。興味がある人がいたら、ぜひ無料部分だけでも読んでいってください。
突然ですが、下記の問題を見て、パッと解答の道筋は立ちますか？
・テニスラケットの市場規模を算出し、売上向上施策を考えよ（5分）
・タクシー広告の国内市場規模を算出せよ（5分)
・レンタル家具市場の規模を算出し、参入可否を見極めよ（5分）
・渋谷駅のコインロッカーの1日の売上を算出せよ(5分）
いかがでしょう。
これらの問題は、すべて私が就職活動を行なっていたときに、実際にコンサルファームで出題された問題です。
これを見て、「あーこのパターンね！」とか「論点はこれとこれだろうなあ」とか思えた人。そんな人たちはこのnoteを読む必要はありません。おそらく、すぐにでも戦略コンサルの内定をもらえるかと思います。
一方
「全く解き方のイメージがつかない」
「なんとなく筋道は立つけど、5分で解ききる自信はない・・」
そんな人も多い方と思います。
内定のためには、これらの問題を時間内で解いて、マネージャークラス以上の面接官と議論し、「コイツはウチでもやっていけそうだな」と思われないといけません。それがコンサル就活・転職です。
結論を言いますが「コンサルのケース面接は、練習すれば絶対できるようになる」これが私の持論です。
きちんとした対策方法で、適切な人から学ぶことができれば、絶対にケース面接は伸びます。ぶっちゃけ1週間ガチでやれば、big4レベルなら戦えるようになると思います。
その意味では、ガクチカをレベルアップするよりだいぶ現実的です。
一方、「世の中の様々なコンサル対策本を読んだり、ケースの壁打ちとかをやっているにも関わらず冒頭の問題を5分どころか10分かけても回答できる自信が無い。」という方も多いのではないでしょうか。
私も世に出ている既存のコンサル対策本や資料は20冊以上読んできましたが、「これだけやればbig4以上に内定十分だね！と思えるものには出会ったことがありません。
例えば、既存の対策には以下のような課題があると考えます。
◯ケース面接対策本(東大ノートシリーズ等）
コンサル就活、転職対策を始める多くの方が手に取る本ですが、ぶっちゃけ基礎的な問題が並んでいるだけです。とりあえずケースのお作法や雰囲気をつかむには良いかと思います。しかし、いかんせん表面的です。
加えて、これらの本は10年以上前に発刊されているため、今対策すべき方法とのズレも感じます。

◯コンサル内定者によるnote
コンサル内定者のnoteも最近はありふれています
これらは「フレッシュな情報をキャッチできる」「内定者ならではの考え方を把握できる」という意味では良いコンテンツです。
しかし、「内定者のレベルが購入前には把握できない」「コンテンツの質が担保されていない」といったリスクがあります。
私も興味があって、20-30本は内定者のnoteを買いましたが、「値段に見合っている」と思えたのは、うち3本ほどでした。
その意味では、内定者のnoteはギャンブル的な要素が強いと言わざるを得ません。

○友人との壁打ち
ケース面接のデリバリー力（思考から発表まで）を高めるには適切なインプット→アウトプットを回すほかありません。
重要なのは、アウトプットした時のFBが適切である、という点です。
初心者や就活生同士でケースの壁打ちなどをやっても、”正解”がわからないという難点があります。
先輩の戦コン内定者や選抜コミュニティの元コンサルの人などが付き合ってくれる場合は良いのですが、そうした機会は多くないのが実体でしょう。
しかし私は就活時代、適切な対策方法もわからなかったため、ケースのレベルを上げるのに、ものすごく苦労しました。
選抜コミュニティにも所属していなかったので、情報を手に入れるのも超大変でしたし、対策もすごく遠回りをしました。
今思えば、すごく非効率な就活をしていたなと思います。ちゃんとした先輩がいれば、過去問なんてすぐ手に入ったし、選抜コミュニティに入っていれば、フェルミ推定の解き方のパターン・考え方だってすぐに教わることができたでしょう。

しかし、私にはその手段がなかったので、その差を”時間”でカバーするしかありませんでした。
みなさんにはそんな想いはしてほしくない。
私はこのこのコンテンツに、私が得たケース・フェルミ推定のノウハウをガチで詰め込みました。

コンテンツの内容
このコンテンツは戦略コンサルタントであるなすが、1年以上の時間をかけて、130pのスライドと10本の動画で、本当にガチでコンサル就活・転職のケース面接・フェルミ推定を解説する、というものです。
このコンテンツには、Big4(デロイト・EY・PwC・KPMG)をはじめ、数多くのコンサルファームに内定するために必要なエッセンスを詰め込みました。


このコンテンツのマジ度合を説明させてください
1.現役戦略コンサルタントのなすが、本当にガチで作りました
タイトルにもあるように、このコンテンツは”ガチ”で作りました。
就活時代に”自分の戦略コンサル内定のノウハウを還元したい”という思いを持ってから、1年の時間をかけて作っています。

他の内定者の方のnoteがどれくらいの時間をかけてコンテンツを作っているかは存じませんが、私はこのコンテンツを本業とも変わらない熱量で作成しました。だからこそ、クオリティには本当に自信があります。
2.全200問以上のナマの過去問から”超優良な問題”を抜き出し解説
私は戦略・総合コンサルのケースを200問以上分析した中から、フェルミ・ケースの絶対的なコツと、この9つの問題を解けば絶対に使える、という超実践的な問題を解説しました。

ぶっちゃけこれやっていただければ、”明日”からあなたのデリバリー力を上げられる自信があります。

3.130枚のスライドを動画で全解説
各問題を、全部動画で解説しています。動画だからこそ、小さなTipsや発表の仕方まで分かるようにできています。
動画なので、通勤・通学時間にも勉強できます。だけど、動画なので、内容は超濃いです。

1問につき30分以上かけて「どうやってフェルミ推定の数値を作るのか。セグメンテーションはどう考えるのか。ボトルネックの特定はどうするのか。筋のいい施策はどうやったら出せるのか」を話しました。
ぶっちゃけここまでしっかり、戦略コンサルタントが解説している教材は他にないと思います。
4.”今だけ”なすに気なったことがあればいつでも相談可能
わざわざnoteで買う理由ってこれだと思うんですよ。書いた人にリアルに聞ける。
もし気になったことがあれば、気軽に購入後にご案内する公式LINEアカウントで聞いてください！
申し訳ないことに、本業やりながらになるので、返信が遅くなってしまうこともあるかと思いますが、できるだけ私の渾身のコンテンツを使ってくれた人には真摯に対応します。
それだけこのコンテンツを出すにあたり、私も自身も覚悟も持っています。


最後に
このコンテンツは僕も本気で作ったので、本気でコンサルに内定したい、という人にだけ届けたいと思い、この値段設定をしています。
ちなみに、3問以上使ってもらった上で、コンテンツの感想をツイートしてくれた人には、コンサルケースの個社別のケース過去問75問を特別にプレゼントしています。正直これだけでも1万円の価値があるかと思いますが、特典としてお配りしております。
有名どころのコンサルに入れば、初任給で600-700万円、20代で1,000万円は余裕なので、将来への投資としてぜひご検討ください。
target_audience: コンサル就活・転職を考えている人。特にPwC、デロイト、EY、KPMG、アクセンチュア、Abeam、ベインアンドカンパニー、ATカーニー、ローランドベルガー、BCGを検討している人向けです
フェルミ推定・ケース面接ついてに、表面的な知識だけではなく、戦略コンサルタントの思考方法・考え方を会得し、本当に内定を獲得したいと考えている人

objectives: Gain insights into circular economy principles in the textile sector, including waste reduction, recycling, and responsible business practices

requirements: There are no strict prerequisites or prior knowledge required to enroll. It is suitable for: • Beginners curious about sustainability and circular economy in fashion and textiles • Industry professionals (designers, manufacturers, brand managers) looking to integrate circular practices into their work • Educators, students, entrepreneurs, and policy makers interested in sustainable transformation

To make the most of this course, it is helpful (but not mandatory) to have: • A basic understanding of the textile and apparel industry • Curiosity and motivation to explore sustainable and circular solutions • Access to a computer or mobile device with internet connection
No specialized software or tools are required.
courses.description:
Welcome to the course “Circular Economy and Sustainable Practices in the Textile and Apparel Industry”
The textile and clothing industry is at a point of major transformation. In a context marked by social, environmental and legislative pressures, the transition from a linear to a circular economic model is no longer optional, but essential.
This course has been designed to provide you with a solid understanding of the principles of the circular economy applied in the T&A sector, focusing on practical solutions, relevant examples and European trends.
The course is aimed at manufacturers, designers, brand managers, communicators, but also all those interested in actively contributing to the green transition of the sector. It is structured in a flexible, friendly and practically applicable format, regardless of your level of experience. We encourage you to go through each module at your own pace, to reflect, to ask questions and to discover how the circular economy can become a viable and competitive reality in your professional activity.
Good luck and welcome to the community of those building a sustainable future for the fashion industry!
This course is developed by E-Circular within the RECONOMY Programme, funded by the Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency (Sida) and implemented by Helvetas Swiss Intercooperation, which is taking place in two regions: the Eastern Partnership (Armenia, Azerbaijan, Georgia, Ukraine, Moldova) and the Western Balkans (Kosovo, North Macedonia, Albania, Montenegro, Serbia and Bosnia and Herzegovina).

About the Authors and Contributors
This course was developed by:
Aurelia Bahnaru – PhD in Economics, Manager at E-CIRCULAR
Alexandra Raețchi – Director of the Center of Excellence in the Light Industry
Roman Bahnaru – Director of Sustainability, ESG Services, E-CIRCULAR
Rodica Guzun – Trainer in Ecology and Education for Sustainable Development, College of Ecology
Dorina Veleșcu – Environmental Engineer, E-CIRCULAR
The course curriculum was validated by Chris Koeleman, trainer at Q&A Quality Assistance - Coachman Training (Netherlands), to ensure alignment with industry standards, effectiveness, and overall quality of the content.
target_audience: Small and medium-sized business (SME) owners in the textile and apparel industry
Sustainability professionals in the fashion and textile sector
Textile and apparel industry managers and business leaders
Fashion designers and product developers interested in circular fashion
Entrepreneurs and startups in the sustainable fashion and textile industry
Environmental managers looking to integrate circular economy principles into production
Supply chain and procurement professionals in the textile sector
Students and young professionals interested in sustainable textiles and circular economy
Teachers, professors, and educators in sustainability, fashion, and business studies

courses.title: Engineering Calculus Made Simple (Derivatives)
courses.bio: A look at derivatives...the short version
objectives: Students will learn mathematical derivatives as they apply to electrical functions
Students will learn about limits.
Students will learn useful Trig Identities.
Students will learn the Squeeze Theorem.
requirements: A basic knowledge of mathematics and trigonometry
courses.description:
In mathematics, the derivative of a function of a real variable measures the sensitivity to change of the function value (output value) with respect to a change in its argument (input value). Derivatives are a fundamental tool of calculus. For example, the derivative of the position of a moving object with respect to time is the object's velocity: this measures how quickly the position of the object changes when time advances.
The derivative of a function of a single variable at a chosen input value, when it exists, is the slope of the tangent line to the graph of the function at that point. The tangent line is the best linear approximation of the function near that input value. For this reason, the derivative is often described as the "instantaneous rate of change", the ratio of the instantaneous change in the dependent variable to that of the independent variable.
This course is designed as the basics review of derivatives as they apply to electrical functions. It is designed for the student of electrical engineering who comes across theoretical formulas that reference derivatives. A detailed understanding of derivatives is not required in order to continue the electrical topic and this course will provide the basic amount required. During this course, the student will learn useful trig identities and approach derivatives with the help of limits and theorems such as the squeeze theorem.
target_audience: Electrical Engineers, Technologists, Technicians & Electrical Students

courses.description:
A food truck is a large motorized vehicle or trailer equipped to store, transport, cook ,prepare, serve and/or sell food. Starting a food truck business is no easy endeavor. The unique combination of sanitation health and transportation regulations as well as the fierce competition for customers and parking spots, makes it a much different enterprise from any other business including running a traditional brick- and - mortar restaurant. How to order from food truck is very important, you need to do your research on food trucks around the city, the number of them will vary from city to city, and each one of the trucks will have their own food cuisine or style. Know that some of most food trucks reach out to the public through social networking sites, such as Twitter and Facebook. To craft a distinctive food truck brand, start by recognizing and grasping your special brand identity. What sets your food truck apart?. Why should customers pick you over your rivals. To build the most authentic brands your values, personality traits, and interest should drive the branding of your business.
In this technologically advance world, the internet plays a great role in connecting customers to restaurants. Food truck business owners should leverage the most out of it and market themselves extensively. There are literally so many ways to advertise themselves on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and other social media platforms. Developing a food truck ordering is essential to improve your business revenue. The businesses that adopt technology experience faster progress. Moreover, consumer behavior changes with the introduction of new technologies. People like online buying nowadays since it brings convenience. Therefore, giving the option to order food online through a food truck mobile ordering app will make your customers happy.
target_audience: Food truck owners, food truck employees, customers, associations, government, regulatory agencies, students, businessmen, mangers, directors, CEO, general public etc.

courses.bio: Earn Pharmacy Technician Certification and Advance in Pharmacy, Clinical Pharmacy, Pharmacology, and Pharma Industry
objectives: Understand the roles, responsibilities, and ethical standards of pharmacy technicians.
Learn about UK-specific regulations including GPhC guidelines, GDPR, and patient confidentiality.
Explore major drug categories, common medications, and their effects and safety precautions.
Master prescription reading, validation, and safe dispensing practices.
Perform accurate pharmacy calculations, including dosages, dilutions, and flow rates.
Gain skills in both sterile and non-sterile drug preparation and safety handling.
Identify and prevent medication errors through UK patient safety practices (e.g., NRLS).
Learn recognised qualification pathways like BTEC/NVQ and how to meet GPhC registration standards.

Preparing for UK Certification: BTEC App: Preparing for UK Certification: BTEC Apprenticeships and Diploma
Bonus Resources & Next Steps: Bonus Lecture: Your Guide to Certificates & Transcripts

requirements: To take this course, you’ll need a good command of English and basic maths skills for pharmacy calculations. No prior pharmacy experience is required—just an interest in healthcare and access to the internet for online learning.
courses.description:
Do you know how a Pharmacy Technician plays a crucial role in ensuring medication safety, improving public health outcomes, and maintaining professional standards in the pharmaceutical industry?
A Pharmacy Technician is essential to the smooth operation of healthcare systems. Yet, many individuals pursuing a Pharmacy Technician career face challenges due to the lack of structured, UK-specific training. Without the right education and support, aspiring professionals may struggle to meet General Pharmaceutical Council (GPhC) standards, compromising both career prospects and patient safety. That’s why accredited Pharmacy Technician training is more important than ever.
In response to a growing demand for qualified Pharmacy Technician professionals in the UK, our Diploma in Pharmacy Technician – CPD Accredited offers the perfect solution. According to NHS workforce data, there is an increasing need for certified Pharmacy Technician staff across hospitals, GP practices, and community pharmacies. As pharmaceutical care continues to evolve, the demand for skilled Pharmacy Technician roles will rise—especially for those trained in UK legislation, ethical practices, and patient safety.
Without proper qualifications, a Pharmacy Technician may face risks such as errors, compliance issues, and restricted registration. Poor training can result in pharmacy teams falling short of legal standards. However, with the right Pharmacy Technician certification, your career is built on a solid foundation of skills, accuracy, and confidence.
Our Comprehensive Pharmacy Technician Training Program
At Care Skills Academy, we’ve created a dynamic, accessible training programme designed to empower learners with the essential competencies required to work as a Pharmacy Technician in the UK. Whether you are new to healthcare or already working in a pharmacy, this course equips you with the expertise needed to become a GPhC-ready Pharmacy Technician.
At the Start of the Course Learners will explore the fundamentals of pharmacy practice, understanding the role of a Pharmacy Technician, their responsibilities, and how they support pharmacists in patient care. The course also introduces learners to the structure of the UK pharmaceutical sector and essential workplace communication for a Pharmacy Technician.
As the Course Progresses You’ll dive deeper into UK pharmacy laws, patient confidentiality, and ethical practices. You'll also gain knowledge in drug classifications, prescription types, aseptic techniques, and pharmaceutical calculations—key areas in any Pharmacy Technician’s daily tasks.
Throughout This Section Learners will study real-world Pharmacy Technician case studies, covering medication error prevention, NHS reporting systems like NRLS, and safety procedures. These modules prepare you to apply best practices consistently in your Pharmacy Technician role.
By the End of This Course You will be prepared for Pharmacy Technician certification pathways, including BTEC Level 2/3 Diplomas and NVQ qualifications, and to meet GPhC registration requirements. You’ll be ready to launch or advance your career as a Pharmacy Technician in any UK pharmacy environment.


Why Choose Care Skills Academy for Pharmacy Technician Training?
We deliver CPD-accredited education tailored to the needs of Pharmacy Technician learners across the UK. Our training ensures you are prepared for certification, regulation, and real-world pharmacy practice.
100% Online Learning – Access flexible modules from anywhere as a Pharmacy Technician in training.
24/7 Access – Study at your convenience, perfect for working Pharmacy Technician learners.
Audio Voiceovers – Listen to expert-led modules designed for Pharmacy Technician development.
Unlimited Assessment Retakes – Retake as needed to master every Pharmacy Technician skill.
Real-World Case Studies – Practical examples that strengthen Pharmacy Technician confidence.
Interactive Quizzes – Reinforce what every Pharmacy Technician must know.
Career-Focused Curriculum – Learn only what is relevant to UK Pharmacy Technician roles.
CPD Accreditation – Earn a recognised Pharmacy Technician certificate to boost your career.


Why Take This Pharmacy Technician Course?
Enrolling in this programme enables you to:
Understand pharmacy law, GPhC regulations, and ethics—all essential for a Pharmacy Technician.
Build real-world Pharmacy Technician skills in dispensing, compounding, and safety.
Learn how to read, process, and validate prescriptions like a certified Pharmacy Technician.
Master calculations used every day by Pharmacy Technician professionals.
Identify and prevent medication errors as a Pharmacy Technician.
Gain support for Pharmacy Technician registration and qualification pathways.
Launch or grow your career as a Pharmacy Technician in NHS, retail, or hospital settings.
Enhance your credentials with a CPD-accredited Pharmacy Technician diploma.


Career Pathways for Pharmacy Technicians
This course prepares learners for various Pharmacy Technician roles, including:
Registered Pharmacy Technician
Community or Hospital Pharmacy Technician
BTEC/NVQ Pharmacy Technician Apprentice
Pharmacy Technician Supervisor
Aseptic Preparation Pharmacy Technician
Dispensing Pharmacy Technician
Clinical Support Worker in Pharmacy Technician teams
Medicines Management Pharmacy Technician
These roles span public and private healthcare sectors, offering job stability, professional development, and long-term career progression for any qualified Pharmacy Technician.
Take the First Step Toward Becoming a Certified Pharmacy Technician
Your pharmacy career begins with the right training. The Diploma in Pharmacy Technician – CPD Accredited provides all the tools you need to succeed. From mastering regulations to understanding prescription safety, this course prepares you to become a confident and competent Pharmacy Technician.
Enrol now to secure your future as a certified Pharmacy Technician and take your first step toward a rewarding and impactful healthcare career.


All of our courses are accredited by the CPD Standards Service, a UK-based independent organisation that ensures high-quality professional training. Upon completion, our students are eligible to apply directly to the CPD Standards Service for an additional CPD accredited certificate for a separate minimal fee. This internationally recognised certificate helps boost your CV and professional profile.

courses.title: Quantitative Risk Assessment (QRA) Training Course
courses.bio: A Complete Guide to Analyzing, Measuring, and Managing Industrial and Process Safety Risks for Safer Operations
objectives: Explain the fundamental principles and purpose of Quantitative Risk Assessment (QRA).
Apply QRA methodologies such as fault tree analysis, event tree analysis, and consequence modeling.
Conduct frequency and probability analysis to quantify risk levels.
Interpret and communicate QRA results for decision-making and regulatory compliance.
Identify hazards and model potential accident scenarios.
Integrate QRA into broader risk management and safety frameworks.
Evaluate case studies and apply QRA tools in practical industrial contexts.

Introduction: Lecture Note I: Introduction to Risk and Quantitative Risk Assessment
Fundamentals of Risk Science: Lecture Note II: Fundamentals of Risk Science
Risk Management Frameworks: Lecture Note III: Risk Management Frameworks
Risk Estimation and Calculation: Lecture Note VII: Risk Estimation and Calculation
Risk Criteria and Tolerability: Lecture Note VIII: Risk Criteria and Tolerability
Uncertainty and Sensitivity Analysis: Lecture Note IX: Uncertainty and Sensitivity Analysis
Mitigation and Risk Reduction Measures: Mitigation and Risk Reduction Measures I
Mitigation and Risk Reduction Measures II
Mitigation and Risk Reduction Measures III
Mitigation and Risk Reduction Measures IV
Lecture Note X: Mitigation and Risk Reduction Measures

requirements: Prior knowledge of risk management or process safety will be an added advantage but is not mandatory.
courses.description:
Quantitative Risk Assessment (QRA) is a systematic and data-driven methodology used to evaluate the likelihood and consequences of hazardous events in industries such as oil and gas, petrochemicals, manufacturing, power generation, and other high-risk sectors. This comprehensive course introduces learners to the fundamental principles, methodologies, and applications of QRA, equipping them with the knowledge and skills required to identify, analyze, and quantify risks effectively. Learners will gain insight into how QRA supports decision-making, regulatory compliance, and safety management, ensuring that organizations can operate with a clear understanding of potential hazards and their impacts.
The course begins by building a solid foundation in risk assessment concepts, probability theory, and consequence modeling. It explores hazard identification techniques, frequency estimation methods, and consequence analysis tools that form the backbone of QRA studies. Real-world case studies and practical exercises is integrated to demonstrate how QRA is applied in various industrial contexts, bridging theory with practical applications.
Emphasis is placed on how QRA can be used to inform safety system design, emergency response strategies, and risk reduction measures. Through these sessions, learners will develop the capability to critically evaluate risk data, recommend mitigation measures, and support stakeholders in making informed, risk-based decisions.
By the end of the course, learners will have developed a strong command of the QRA process, from hazard identification to reporting and communication of results. They will be able to contribute effectively to multidisciplinary safety studies, support regulatory submissions, and enhance organizational resilience by integrating QRA into overall risk management strategies. This course is ideal for engineers, safety professionals, risk managers, and consultants seeking to strengthen their expertise in quantitative risk analysis and its applications in high-hazard industries. Wait no more and enroll in this course today!
target_audience: Process and chemical engineers involved in safety and risk analysis.
Health, Safety, and Environment (HSE) professionals.
Safety and reliability engineers in oil, gas, and manufacturing industries.
Risk management consultants and auditors.
Regulatory compliance officers and inspectors.
Graduate students and researchers in engineering, safety, and risk disciplines.
Managers and decision-makers seeking to understand risk assessment tools for informed decisions.

courses.description:
هذه الدورة مخصصة للجميع، وتتيح لك معرفة كل ما يتعلق بتذاكر Amadeus GDS؛ ستتعرف على كيفية إجراء الحجوزات الكاملة، وكيفية إدارة الحجوزات، وكيفية التعامل مع طلبات ما بعد البيع للإلغاء أو استرداد الأموال أو الاستبدال (إعادة الإصدار).
- كيف يعمل نظام الحجز أماديوس.
- طلبات توفر الرحلة:
- الأمران: "AN" و"SN" وخياراتهما.
- كيفية اختيار جزء أو أكثر من قطاعات الرحلة.
- طلبات عرض ترددات الرحلات مع "TN"
- ترميز وترميز المدن والمطارات.
- ترميز وترميز شركات الطيران والدول والمعدات.
- كيفية إجراء الحجز (PNR):
- العناصر الخمسة الإلزامية لسجل اسم المسافر
- حجز راكب واحد، قطعة واحدة
- حجز راكب واحد ومتعدد القطاعات
- حجز متعدد الركاب وقطاع واحد
- حجز متعدد الركاب ومتعدد القطاعات
- كيفية البحث عن حجز (PNR):
- حسب رقم الملف.
- بالاسم.
- بالاسم الأول والأخير.
- أنواع الركاب (الطفل، الطفل، الشباب وكبار السن)
- كيفية إدارة وتعديل عناصر الحجز.
- كيفية الإشارة إلى الخدمات الخاصة (الأمتعة الإضافية، الوجبة الخاصة، حيوان الكشافة، الكرسي المتحرك، إلخ).
- كيفية تسعير الحجز، وكيفية اختيار أفضل سعر ممكن
- كيفية الإشارة إلى طريقة الدفع.
- كيفية اختيار مقعد الراكب وسعره.
- كيفية إصدار وطباعة التذاكر الإلكترونية.
- كيفية إدخال وثائق الركاب وجواز السفر وبطاقة الهوية.
- التمرين المصحح "الحجز الكامل" على نظام أماديوس:
- الوثيقة الإلكترونية المتنوعة (EMD):
- مفهوم قناع تعريفة TQT
- مفهوم قناع إدارة الجودة الشاملة من العقوبات والخدمات الخاصة.
- كيفية حجز تذكرة مفتوحة (الجزء المفتوح)
- كيفية الاطلاع على شروط السعر والبحث عن العقوبات في حالة طلب استرداد المبلغ أو تغيير التاريخ أو الدرجة أو خط سير الرحلة.
- كيفية عرض عقوبات استرداد الأموال.
- كيفية عرض رسوم الأجرة الإضافية في حالة تغيير التاريخ أو الوقت أو الدرجة أو خط سير الرحلة.
- كيفية عرض حالات التذاكر:
- قابلة للتحرير أو غير قابلة للتحرير
- مستردة أو غير قابلة للاسترداد
- الفرق بين إعادة المصادقة وإعادة الإصدار:
- كيفية إدارة ما بعد البيع:
- كيفية إلغاء (إبطال) التذكرة.
- كيفية استرداد كامل المبلغ باستخدام برنامج Amadeus Ticket Changer.
- كيفية استرداد جزء من المبلغ باستخدام تذكرة أماديوس   التغيير.
- كيفية متابعة السداد الكامل في الدليل.
- تصحيح التمرين السداد الكامل مع ATC على نظام أماديوس.
- تصحيح التمرين السداد الجزئي مع ATC على نظام أماديوس.
- تصحيح تمرين السداد الكامل في الدليل على نظام أماديوس.
- كيفية تبادل التاريخ أو الدرجة أو خط سير الرحلة مع Amadeus Ticket Changer. (إعادة بث ATC):
- تصحيح تمرين تبادل التاريخ في ATC على نظام أماديوس.
- تصحيح تمرين تبادل فئة ATC على نظام أماديوس.
- تصحيح تمرين تبادل التاريخ يدوياً على نظام أماديوس.
- كيفية استبدال التاريخ أو الفصل أو خط سير الرحلة في الدليل. (إعادة الإرسال اليدوي):
- كيفية إجراء عملية إعادة التصديق.
- كيفية عرض التقارير النقدية (نصف شهرية).
- كيفية إدراج جميع حجوزاتك:
- عن طريق الشركة
- حسب التاريخ
- جميع تحفظاتك
- كيفية إدراج ملاحظة مخصصة للراكب.
- كيفية إدراج ملاحظة مخصصة للعاملين على متن الطائرة.
* ملفات PDF للتحميل.
target_audience: All people who want to travel as Travel Agent or Small Scale Agent in the Aeroport area.

courses.title: Investigación de desviaciones (No conformidades)
courses.bio: Investigación de desviaciones o no conformidades en la industria farmacéutica
objectives: Desviaciones

Resolución de problemas en la industria

Farmacéutica

requirements: Interés en la resolución de problemas
Conocimientos básicos de la industria
courses.description:
En este curso aprenderás a ser un líder en la resolución de desviaciones. Partiendo desde el entendimiento de la función de las desviaciones dentro del sistema de gestión de calidad, hasta el desarrollo de proyectos de alto impacto Lean Six Sigma.
Aprenderás a utilizar las herramientas de mejora continua y su aplicación en la industria. Este curso también incluye plantillas y ejercicios para que utilices durante las investigaciones.
Este curso es una guía completa que detalla aquellas competencias que debemos poder reconocer en todo buen líder de investigaciones y propuestas de mejora continua.
Este programa es teórico y práctico ya que consta de varios ejercicios prácticos, anímate a elevar tu nivel de conocimiento.


¿Que aprenderás?
Dominaras la herramienta de investigación de las 8 disciplinas
Aprenderás a realizar mapeos de proceso:
Diagramas de bloques
Diagramas SIPOC
Cross Functional process map
Aprenderás a utilizar las Herramientas de análisis causa raíz:
Los 5 por qué?
El diagrama de Ishikawa (Espina de pescado)
El Coeficiente de determinación
El análisis de varianza (ANOVA)
Aprenderás a implementar Poka yokes para las CAPAs
Aprenderás a aplicar herramientas de Lean manufacturing como:
Reporte A3
Kanban
Aprenderás a desarrollar un proyecto de alto impacto Lean Six SIgama para la Mejora continua:
Utilizando la metodología DMAIC
Crearas una base de datos a través de Excel (Utilizando comandos y tablas pivot)
Generaras un Dashboard para el monitoreo y análisis del sistema de desviaciones (Gráficas inteligentes, slicers)
¡Bienvenido!
